recipes.title: How to Make Fresh Pasta
recipes.description: In Emilia-Romagna, the region in Italy where fresh pasta rules, the dough is classically made with soft wheat flour and whole fresh eggs. Purists in the province prefer pasta doughs that have been rolled out on a wooden board to those rolled out with a machine, saying that sauce clings much better to the hand-rolled variety.

recipes.title: Classic Pasta Dough
recipes.description: Italians use soft wheat flour to make fresh pasta. We tested the recipe with soft wheat flour and all-purpose flour and tasted them side by side, and we much prefer the soft wheat version—it gives the pasta a silkier texture. Order Italian-style flour from www.kingarthurflour.com, or look for Italian 00 flour at gourmet or online stores. Use this dough to make Ravioli with Herbed Ricotta Filling (page 141).

recipes.description: Air-fryer eggplant fries coated in savory breading and Parmesan cheese totally make us forget about classic potato fries. They work well as a side dish or an anytime snack.

recipes.title: Apple-Nut Blue Cheese Tartlets
recipes.description: These tasty appetizers look and taste gourmet, but they're easy to make and have loads of blue cheese flavor. The phyllo shells and filling can be made in advance

recipes.title: Avocado Endive Cups with Salsa
recipes.description: I jazz up guacamole by serving it atop endive leaves. Add a brilliant red pepper salsa, and you’ve got a standout appetizer.

recipes.title: Baked Pot Stickers with Dipping Sauce
recipes.description: Twisting these wonton wrappers like little candies makes them fuss-free, and the dipping sauce is packed with sweet heat.

recipes.title: Baked Veggie Cups
recipes.description: These colorful veggie cups are not only tasty, but they also pack in a surprising amount of nutrition! The addition of mozzarella and Parmesan is the perfect Italian touch.

recipes.title: Balsamic-Goat Cheese Grilled Plums
recipes.description: Make a bold statement with this simple yet elegant treat. Ripe plums are grilled and then dressed with a balsamic reduction and tangy goat cheese.

recipes.title: White Bean Hummus
recipes.description: All it takes is a handful of ingredients and a few minutes to pull together this creamy white bean hummus recipe.

recipes.title: Caprese Skewers
recipes.description: Light, satisfying and healthful in one impossibly easy-to-make dish? Yes, please! Enjoy these Caprese skewers as an app, side dish

recipes.title: Roasted Chickpeas
recipes.description: Crispy chickpeas will become a favorite when you need something crunchy on your salads and bowls. An added bonus? They're vegan!

recipes.title: Cilantro & Lime Chicken with Scoops
recipes.description: I came up with this recipe when I was preparing for a large party and wanted a healthy Tex-Mex chicken to serve in tortilla chip cups. You can make this party dish ahead of time to free yourself for time-sensitive dishes. Serve it in tortilla cups or any other savory, crispy cup you like. Enjoy the leftovers over salad greens or wrapped up in tender tortillas for burritos.

recipes.title: Texas Caviar
recipes.description: This top-rated recipe for Texas caviar is a guaranteed favorite at any tailgate or potluck. The fresh dip is made from black-eyed peas, corn, tomatoes and avocado, all tossed in a zippy vinaigrette and served with crispy tortilla chips.

recipes.title: Corn Salsa
recipes.description: This simple corn salsa is a celebration of summer produce.

recipes.title: Curried Chicken Meatball Wraps
recipes.description: My strategy to get picky kids to eat healthy: Letting everyone assemble their dinner at the table. We love these easy meatball wraps, topped with crunchy veggies and peanuts, sweet raisins, and a creamy dollop of yogurt.

recipes.title: Four-Tomato Salsa
recipes.description: The variety of tomatoes, onions and peppers makes this chunky salsa so good. Whenever I try to take a batch to a get-together, it's hard to keep my family from finishing it off first! It's a super snack with tortilla chips or as a relish with meat.

recipes.title: Fresh from the Garden Wraps
recipes.description: We moved into a house with a garden that needed tending. Using the herbs we found, we made these fresh-tastic wraps for our first dinner there.

recipes.title: Makeover Creamy Artichoke Dip
recipes.description: Folks are sure to gather around this ooey-gooey, lightened-up dip whenever it's placed on any buffet table. With cheese, jalapenos and a hint of lemon, it's a treasured favorite.

recipes.title: Peachy Jalapeno Guacamole
recipes.description: Fresh jalapenos and summer-ripe peaches give this creamy guacamole so much flavor. It's got a little kick, but I love that it's not so spicy it burns off my taste buds!

recipes.title: Pork Satay
recipes.description: This easy pork satay recipe combines savory, sweet and spiced flavors with a rich peanut sauce. Whether you’re hosting or craving something special, this dish is sure to impress.

recipes.title: Beet Hummus
recipes.description: Break out of the plain hummus rut with this beet hummus recipe. Earthy, sweet beets are a vibrant, wholesome addition to the classic dip.

recipes.title: Red Pepper Tapenade
recipes.description: This roasted red pepper tapenade combines sweet red peppers, almonds and basil into a delicious spread that's perfect for entertaining or everyday snacking. Serve it with toasted baguette slices or water crackers.

recipes.title: Skinny Quinoa Veggie Dip
recipes.description: Don’t let the name fool you. This good-for-you recipe may appeal to an athlete in training, but it has plenty of flavor to satisfy everyone. We use crunchy cucumber slices for dippers.

recipes.title: Smoked Salmon New Potatoes
recipes.description: Give twice-baked potatoes a rest this year and try these stuffed spuds. Smoked salmon and cream cheese blended with lemon juice and dill are simply piped into small red potatoes. Leftovers are even good with eggs for breakfast.

recipes.title: Spicy Shrimp Salsa
recipes.description: Radishes add a wonderful crunch to this colorful salsa that is also superb over grilled fish. There's just enough jalapeno to give flavor without much of the heat.

recipes.title: Tangy Texas Salsa
recipes.description: I'm a "transplant" from Wisconsin currently living in Texas. Even after 20 years, I can't get enough of our wonderful local citrus. This is one way to work it into a main dish. The combination of tangy fruit, spicy jalapeno and distinctive cilantro is perfect over any meat, poultry or fish. We also dip into it with chips.

recipes.title: Tomato Focaccia
recipes.description: Tomato focaccia bread is a fantastic side for all sorts of dishes, such as roasted chicken, pork chops, sea bass, and more. It's also fantastic on its own or topped with a fried egg.

recipes.title: Vegetable Samosas
recipes.description: My family enjoys the wonderful Indian flavors in a traditional samosa. Baked instead of fried, this version has fewer calories but keeps all the classic tastes and textures we love.

recipes.title: Zippy Shrimp Skewers
recipes.description: These flavorful skewers deliver a mouthwatering kick with minimal effort. Fix them for your next party and watch them disappear.

recipes.title: Cheesy Bruschetta Dip
recipes.description: This creamy, flavorful dip comes together quickly and is a real crowd-pleaser. It is a delicious complement to a meal or a fun appetizer to serve at a party.

recipes.title: Dirty Martini Dip
recipes.description: You'll find all the iconic ingredients of the namesake cocktail in this dirty martini dip, right down to the vodka, vermouth and olive brine.

recipes.title: Salsa Criolla
recipes.description: If salsa criolla sounds exotic, your ears are not deceiving you. It’s an essential Peruvian salsa that brings acidity and sweetness to sandwiches, meat dishes, potatoes and even eggs. But it’s not for Peruvian cuisine only. Try it on your regular weeknight meals for a little variety.

recipes.title: Smashed Zucchini Dip
recipes.description: Smashed zucchini dip is a take on the eggplant spread called baba ganoush, but with a different main ingredient. It's the healthy and flavorful party spread you never knew you needed!

recipes.title: Granny's 7 Layer Dip
recipes.description: Such a special recipe today from Granny! This dip is no-cook, easy to throw together, and so DELICIOUS with chips!

recipes.title: Avocado Shrimp Salsa
recipes.description: A quick to prepare salsa that's a go-to for entertaining, snacking, and lite meals...perfect for hot days when you don't want to cook!

recipes.title: One Skillet Cheesy Salsa Chicken Rice Bake

recipes.title: Mexican Street Corn Dip
recipes.description: All the flavors of street corn mixed into the creamiest corn-filled dip. Quick, easy, and so delicious with tortilla chips on the side!

recipes.title: Ceviche
recipes.description: Ceviche made from raw fish or shrimp "cooked" in tangy citrus and mixed with cucumber, red onion, cilantro, jalapeño, avocado, and tomatoes.

recipes.title: Pumpkin and Shrimp Ceviche

The pumpkin replaces the jicama, and it’s just barely cooked to offer a crunchy delight of fall flavor. It will taste best if you allow it to marinate overnight. —Robert Rossi, Independence, Louisiana

recipes.title: Yale College Punch
recipes.description: Retro cocktails get all the attention these days, but punch predates individual mixed drinks by at least two centuries, according to Punch: The Delights (and Dangers) of the Flowing Bowl ($24; Perigee). The book, by drinks historian David Wondrich, includes historically accurate recipes dating back as far as 1668. Some of the punches call for far-out ingredients like whale cholesterol, but this recipe from 1867 is much more doable for modern-day spirit lovers. It's the 19th-century version of that college favorite 'jungle juice.'

recipes.title: Herb Quick Bread

recipes.title: Banana-Nut Muffins
recipes.description: Use ripe bananas, and you'll be pleasantly surprised with extra-sweet, moist wholesome muffins.

recipes.title: Healthy Apple-Walnut Muffins
recipes.description: Made with no added fat or sugar, these tasty muffins use fruit and buttermilk to keep them moist.

recipes.title: Buttermilk Biscuits
recipes.description: The buttermilk makes this traditional Southern specialty especially light and tender.

recipes.title: Butter Crescents
recipes.description: Start the day on a high note with a cup of tea and these melt-in-your-mouth crescents.

recipes.title: Sweet Bread
recipes.description: A sweet bread recipe with honey, flax seed, sesame seed, and oatmeal.

recipes.title: Rusk
recipes.description: A traditional colonial sweet bread/rusk made with sugar, butter, flour, and yeast.

recipes.title: Juhny Cake, or Hoe Cake (Johnnycake)
recipes.description: An early American cornmeal bread, one of the first recorded recipes for Johnnycake.

recipes.title: Biscuit
recipes.description: Simple colonial biscuit recipe with flour, butter, egg, and milk.

recipes.title: Mesa Verde Maiz
recipes.description: Corn pancakes with cheese and green chiles, topped with tomatoes.

recipes.title: Sweet Anise Challah
recipes.description: Traditional braided challah bread with honey, orange, and anise seed.

recipes.title: Not For Prophet Bread
recipes.description: A rolled sourdough bread filled with cheddar cheese and sauteed onion.

recipes.title: Tuna Nicoise Salad
recipes.description: Classic French composed salad with tuna, potatoes, green beans, eggs, and olives.

recipes.title: Fattoosh
recipes.description: Traditional Lebanese bread salad with crispy pita, fresh vegetables, sumac, and mint.

recipes.title: Lebanese Rubbed Salad
recipes.description: A fresh salad with mixed greens, feta cheese, and balsamic vinegar, hand-mixed for even coating.

recipes.title: Lebanese Bean Salad
recipes.description: A hearty three-bean salad with fava beans, chickpeas, and white beans marinated in lemon and garlic.

recipes.title: Lebanese Radish Salad
recipes.description: A refreshing salad with crisp radishes, toasted walnuts, mint ribbons, and honey-lemon dressing.

recipes.title: Tabouli
recipes.description: A refreshing Lebanese salad of bulgur wheat, fresh herbs, tomatoes, and lemon-olive oil dressing.

recipes.title: Cucumber Tomato Salad
recipes.description: From the colors alone, you can tell this cucumber tomato salad will be bursting with fresh flavors. The feta cheese adds a layer of tang and creaminess. Chilling time aside, this recipe is ready in a matter of minutes.

recipes.title: Berry-Beet Salad
recipes.description: Here's a delightfully different salad that balances the earthy flavor of beets with the natural sweetness of berries. If you prefer, substitute crumbled feta for the goat cheese.

recipes.title: Classic Cobb Salad
recipes.description: Making this salad is a lot like putting in a garden. I plant everything in nice, neat sections, just as I do with seedlings.

recipes.title: Corn ‘n’ Cucumbers Salad
recipes.description: This cucumber corn salad was one of my mother's recipes and I think of her whenever I make it. It's a nice change from a regular cucumber salad.

recipes.title: Garden Bounty Panzanella Salad
recipes.description: My sister gave me fresh tomatoes and basil, so I made a bread salad known as Panzanella. The longer it sits, the more the bread soaks up the seasonings.

recipes.title: Honey-Mustard Brussels Sprouts Salad
recipes.description: Even if you dislike Brussels sprouts, you will love this dish. The dressing is so tasty, and it pairs amazingly with the apples, grapes and walnuts. You can also add whatever cheese, nuts or fruit you prefer.

recipes.title: Kiwi-Strawberry Spinach Salad
recipes.description: This pretty strawberry kiwi salad is always a hit when I serve it! The recipe came from a cookbook, but I personalized it. Sometimes just a small change in ingredients can create a big difference.

recipes.title: Quick Corn Salad
recipes.description: This sensational yet easy corn salad is a delight to serve because you can make it ahead, and it's an easy way to put garden bounty to good use. With colorful ingredients like corn, tomato and green pepper, it's also pretty in the bowl and on your plate.

recipes.title: Radish Cucumber Salad
recipes.description: I put this cucumber radish salad together with vegetables I had left in my garden. My family liked it so much, I started taking it to community suppers and was often asked for the recipe. It's a refreshing accompaniment for any entree.

recipes.title: Roasted Apple Salad with Spicy Maple-Cider Vinaigrette
recipes.description: We bought loads of apples and needed to use them. To help the flavors come alive, I roasted the apples and tossed them with a sweet dressing.

recipes.title: Shrimp Avocado Salad
recipes.description: Shrimp avocado salad mixes tender shellfish with fresh vegetables for a cool, protein-filled lunch or easy light dinner.

recipes.title: Spinach Salad with Warm Bacon Dressing
recipes.description: This spinach salad with warm bacon dressing proves that it's not difficult to get through an entire bag of spinach if it's dressed in a tangy, mustardy, brown-sugar bacon vinaigrette. Customize this classic salad with any toppings you like.

recipes.title: Strawberry-Blue Cheese Steak Salad
recipes.description: At lunch one day, a friend told me about a steak salad she'd had at a party. It sounded so fantastic I had to try it for myself. My family would eat it nonstop if we could. Can't seem to get enough of that tangy dressing!

recipes.title: Tangerine Tossed Salad
recipes.description: My mother taught me how to cook when I was a young girl. The sweet tangerines and crunchy caramelized almonds make this one of my favorite recipes.

recipes.title: Tangy Cilantro Lime Confetti Salad
recipes.description: I love standout salads that burst with flavor

recipes.title: Tomato Cucumber Mozzarella Salad
recipes.description: The fresher the ingredients, the tastier this tomato cucumber mozzarella salad will be. What's more, you can mix and match parts of this recipe to fit your preferences and use up what's already in your kitchen.

recipes.title: Tomato-Melon Chicken Salad
recipes.description: Nothing says summer like picking watermelon, tomatoes and raspberries, then tossing them together in a salad. The addition of grilled chicken makes it a satisfying summery meal.

recipes.title: Twisted Eggs Benedict Salad
recipes.description: Salad for breakfast? Absolutely. You can prep everything except the dressing and chill it overnight. In the morning, dress the salad and poach the eggs.

recipes.title: Zucchini Panzanella Salad
recipes.description: I learned how to make panzanella from my friend's grandmother. Once I discovered how to make the perfect vinaigrette, it became a dish I crave during the summer. It's also a great way to use day-old bread and your garden's bounty of zucchini.

recipes.title: Barley Corn Salad
recipes.description: A terrific alternative to pasta salad, this colorful side dish adds refreshing herb flavor to corn, barley, and red and green peppers. Bring it to your next get-together and see how fast it disappears!

recipes.title: Steak Salad
recipes.description: This classic steak salad recipe features a perfectly cooked, well-seasoned steak atop a hearty mix of greens and toppings. It's a nutritious and quick dinner perfect for any night of the week.

recipes.title: Chili-Rubbed Steak with Black Bean Salad
recipes.description: Busy weeknights don't stop my husband from firing up the grill. This meal-in-one comes together fast. Try it with chimichurri and cotija cheese.

recipes.title: Chicken Salad with Grapes
recipes.description: Bored with the usual turkey sandwich? This easy chicken salad with grapes recipe is anything but boring! Shredded rotisserie chicken is dressed in a creamy dressing and tossed with juicy grapes, crunchy celery and chopped pecans.

recipes.title: Greek Orzo Salad
recipes.description: This tart, refreshing salad is a big hit in my home. All the tasty toppings

recipes.title: Spaghetti Salad
recipes.description: We love how easy this spaghetti salad recipe is to prepare in advance. After it sets up in the fridge, it's a hearty, flavorful side dish or entree that's perfect for a crowd.

recipes.title: Tuna Nicoise Salad
recipes.description: Tuna Nicoise salad is a perfect lunch for a weekend or even to make ahead for the work week. Our recipe is traditional with tuna, tomatoes and beans, but is easily adaptable to suit your tastes.

recipes.title: Couscous Salad
recipes.description: This couscous salad recipe gets five stars from our reviewers! Create a versatile, summery salad that can be served as a potluck dish or a light lunch. Or, feel free to add chickpeas, grilled meat or seafood to make it filling enough to enjoy for dinner.

recipes.title: Chopped Chicken Caesar Salad Sandwiches
recipes.description: Imagine: A creamy garlicky dressing, crunchy romaine lettuce and hearty chicken all encased in a chewy bun that's like a super-sized crouton. These chopped chicken Caesar salad sandwiches are simple, delightful and perfect for salad lovers.

recipes.title: Crunchy Cucumber and Fennel Salad
recipes.description: I created this when my herbs were overflowing. It makes for a refreshing, crunchy salad to enjoy on those hot summer days. I used an English cucumber because of its mild flavor, but other types can be used as well.

recipes.title: Fattoush Salad
recipes.description: This type of bread salad is very popular in the Middle East. It uses sumac, which is a distinctive spice that adds an acidic flavor to dishes, as does lemon juice.

recipes.title: Mediterranean Chickpea Salad
recipes.description: For a high-protein cold meal that comes together quickly, you can't go wrong with Mediterranean chickpea salad. It's loaded with fresh flavors and works as a side dish with a Med-style dinner, or on its own as a light lunch.

recipes.title: Gremolata Pasta Salad
recipes.description: Straying from heavier, mayonnaise-based pasta salads, I created this lighter olive oil-based salad. Lemon juice, feta cheese, garlic and tomatoes brighten up this colorful dish.

recipes.title: Japanese Crab and Avocado Salad
recipes.description: It can be a challenge to find winter holiday recipes that are suited to warmer climates. This luxurious Asian-inspired crab salad fills the bill with its festive colors and flavors.

recipes.title: 7-Layer Salad
recipes.description: This colorful 7-layer salad is as beautiful as it is delicious. Build it in a clear glass bowl to show off the layers at potlucks, picnics and holiday celebrations.

recipes.title: Chicken Salad With Greek Yogurt
recipes.description: This 15-minute Chicken Salad Chick copycat recipe has become one of my very favorite meals. But it needn’t even be a meal! The chicken salad is so scrumptious on crackers or as the dip on a crudite platter.

recipes.title: Tomato Tuna Tower Salad
recipes.description: In this quick and easy tomato tuna tower salad recipe, thick slices of juicy, ripe tomatoes serve as the perfect platform for mounds of flavor-packed tuna salad.

recipes.title: Green Chile Salad
recipes.description: A fresh salad with tomatoes, onion, and green chiles in a vinegar dressing.

recipes.title: Marinated Garden Salad
recipes.description: Fresh vegetables marinated with green chiles and lemon in a tangy dressing.

recipes.title: Piquant Salad
recipes.description: A gelatin salad with tomato and green chile sauce.

recipes.title: Green Chile and Cucumber Salad
recipes.description: A molded gelatin salad with cucumber and green chiles.

recipes.title: Coconut Cupcakes with Chocolate and Almonds
Deep Dark Chocolate Biscotti
recipes.description: Whole-wheat flour, flaxseed, and almonds add fiber and antioxidants.

recipes.title: Mango-Agave Sorbet
recipes.description: The Mexican pedigree of this dessert makes it a fitting way to end a dinner of Hidden Rainbow Albondigas (page 162). Because tequila also comes from the agave plant, it fits naturally here; we use silver, or clear, tequila to keep the mango color vibrant. Dress up scoops with lime rind curls, if desired.

recipes.title: Chocolate Crepes Sweetened with Truvia Natural Sweetener
Apple Berry Galette with Truvia Natural Sweetener
Chocolate Bark
recipes.description: A customizable chocolate treat with your choice of toppings - choose from crunchy toppings (nuts, toffee, peppermints), chewy toppings (dried fruits, marshmallows), and spices (sea salt, cardamom, pink peppercorns).

recipes.title: Gingerbread Cupcakes with Caramelized Mango Buttercream
German Chocolate Cake with Coconut-Pecan Cajeta Frosting
Toasted Coconut Cake with Coconut Filling and Buttercream
La Dolce Vida Candy Cane Truffles
recipes.description: Easy chocolate truffles dusted in cocoa and candy cane bits.

recipes.title: Chocolate Cherry Treats
recipes.description: Chocolate and cherries, flavors of the famous Black Forest Torte, come together in these no-bake bars.

recipes.title: Rice Krispies Nutty Butterscotch Squares
recipes.description: Golden raisins, dried apricots, butterscotch morsels and peanut butter combine in these tasty bars.

recipes.title: Blueberry Cheesecake
recipes.description: Creamy cheesecake topped with fresh blueberry sauce.

recipes.title: Lemon Tart
recipes.description: Classic French lemon tart with buttery pastry shell and tangy lemon curd filling.

recipes.title: Chocolate Chip Cookies
recipes.description: Classic chocolate chip cookies with dark chocolate chunks.

recipes.title: Layali Libnan
recipes.description: Lebanese Nights - a semolina pudding with rose water, topped with whipped cream, pistachios, and caramel syrup.

recipes.title: Lebanese Style Cookies
recipes.description: Traditional Lebanese cookies with semolina, warm spices, rose water, and orange flower water, shaped into wreaths.

recipes.title: Mahallebi
recipes.description: A creamy Lebanese milk pudding topped with pistachios and cinnamon syrup.

recipes.title: Strawberry-Rhubarb Ice Pops
recipes.description: These cool, creamy pops are a deliciously different way to use up the bounty from your rhubarb patch.

recipes.title: Banana Chocolate Chip Cookies
recipes.description: These warm, gooey, indulgent banana chocolate chip cookies can be made in just 35 minutes. Bake a batch of three dozen to nosh on all week long.

recipes.title: Carrot Cookies
recipes.description: Carrot cookies are sweet and colorful, a harmony between the garden and the dessert table. This recipe will add a bit of old-fashioned simplicity to your cookie lineup.

recipes.title: Coconut Macaroons
recipes.description: These crunchy, golden and chewy coconut macaroons are ideal for their simplicity and texture, and you can have this treat on the table in 30 minutes or less.

recipes.title: Chipotle Crackle Cookies
recipes.description: I usually bake these special cookies for the holidays, but my family loves them so I bake them for their birthdays. The addition of ground chipotle chile pepper gives these cookies a little zing.  The dough may be sticky, so I dip my hands in confectioners' sugar for easier handling.

recipes.title: Chocolate Crinkle Cookies
recipes.description: These rich and fudgy chocolate crinkle cookies are perfect for sharing at holiday get-togethers.

recipes.title: Chocolate-Dipped Strawberry Meringue Roses
recipes.description: Eat these pretty treats as is or crush them into a bowl of strawberries and whipped cream. Readers of my blog, utry.it, went nuts when I posted that idea.

recipes.title: Coconut Kisses
recipes.description: Chewy on the inside and crisp on the outside, these meringue cookies are delicious. They add a light touch to the cookie platter, not only during the holidays but all year round.

recipes.title: First-Place Coconut Macaroons
recipes.description: These coconut macaroon cookies earned me a first-place ribbon at the county fair. They remain my husband's favorites

recipes.title: Soft Gingersnap Cookies
recipes.description: You’ll want to bake endless trays of these soft gingersnap cookies. The dough packs warm spices such as ginger, cinnamon and cloves.

recipes.title: Lemon Meringue Cookies
recipes.description: This just-sweet-enough fluffy lemon meringue cookie is easier to make than its impressive looks imply. The creamy lemon curd against a crisp and light meringue is simply outstanding.

recipes.title: Lime Coconut Biscotti
recipes.description: My family loves this recipe! It’s great with that morning cup of coffee, delicious as an afternoon snack or after-dinner dessert. Citrusy and crunchy, not too sweet, it always hits the spot.

recipes.title: Mocha Meringue Sandwich Cookies
recipes.description: These crisp, chewy cookies can be made any size you choose. They're also great with a variety of fillings

recipes.title: Molasses Crinkle Cookies
recipes.description: If you love desserts with warm and comforting spices, try these molasses crinkle cookies. They're crispy on the outside, chewy in the center and packed with irresistible flavors.

recipes.title: No-Bake Apple Pie
recipes.description: Forget the oven. This chilled, no-bake apple pie is served in a no-bake crust for the ultimate cool, sweet treat.

recipes.title: Pineapple Pudding Cake
recipes.description: Take a trip to the tropics with this creamy and refreshing pineapple pudding cake. Shortcuts like a boxed cake mix, instant pudding and whipped topping ensure this easy cake recipe comes together in no time at all.

recipes.title: Pumpkin Seed Cranberry Biscotti
recipes.description: Hints of pumpkin seed and almond give this biscotti recipe a wonderful flavor that's just right for fall. Try one with a cup of coffee or hot cocoa!

recipes.title: Soft Honey Cookies
recipes.description: These pillowy honey cookies pair perfectly with an afternoon cup of coffee or tea.

recipes.title: Meringue Cookies
recipes.description: These sweet little swirls are light as can be. They're all you need after a big, special dinner.

recipes.title: Hanukkah Cookies
recipes.description: Enriched with cream cheese, these Hanukkah cookies are soft, rich and ultra-tender. They look especially festive when they're decorated with colorful royal icing.

recipes.title: Magic Cake
recipes.description: This popular magic cake has three distinct layers and requires only six ingredients to make. It disappears fast, too, just like magic!

recipes.title: Matzo Meal Pancakes
recipes.description: These matzo meal pancakes are a wonderful dish for breakfast or brunch. They can be served with applesauce, jam or sour cream. When beating the egg whites, start on a low speed and gradually increase to reach a good consistency.

recipes.title: Snickerdoodle Cake
recipes.description: With its layers of cinnamon-swirl vanilla cake and tangy cinnamon cream cheese frosting, this snickerdoodle cake tastes just like the classic cookie.

recipes.title: Easy Lemon Fritter Cake
recipes.description: Each bite is filled with a swirl of lemony goodness and topped with a quick lavender-vanilla glaze - so delicious!

recipes.title: Aztec chocolate sorbet
recipes.description: Chocolate sorbet is a refreshing alternative to chocolate ice cream. Our easy Aztec chocolate sorbet is inspired by xocolatl (hot chocolate’s Aztec predecessor), with notes of chilli and cinnamon. Why it’s so good: “Chocolate sorbets are less common than their ice cream counterparts, but a water-based ice lets the flavour of the chocolate come through in its purest form,” says head of food Tom Shingler. “It’s surprisingly refreshing for something sweet and chocolatey, lik

recipes.title: Thomasina Miers' molten mole chocolate cake
recipes.description: This molten chocolate cake by Mexican food aficionado Thomasina Miers has a welcome chilli warmth, inspired by Mexican mole. Chocolate cake with a twist: “An astonishingly good cake that manages to be both thrilling and comforting with its smoky, salty, deeply chocolatey taste and unexpected layers of flavour from the chilli and sesame,” says Thomasina. “It has a richness, but there is also a raffish feeling to it, perhaps due to the surprising background warmth of the ancho.”

recipes.title: Fudgy Chocolate Layer Cake
recipes.description: Chocolate fans will surely applaud this to-die-for fudge cake.

recipes.title: Boston Cream Pie
recipes.description: Despite the name, this chocolate-glazed American classic is actually a cake.

recipes.title: Toffee-Topped Bars
recipes.description: Serve these luscious after-school treats with a tall, cold glass of milk.

recipes.title: Apple-Oatmeal Cookies
recipes.description: These soft, chewy cookies are perfect for filling the cookie jar.

recipes.title: Almond Streusel Cake
recipes.description: Transform a plain cake into an irresistible delight with a crumbly almond streusel.

recipes.title: Orange-Glazed Coffee Cake
recipes.description: Light and refreshing, this cake doubles the flavor and fragrance of fresh orange.

recipes.title: Fresh Berry Crumb Pie
recipes.description: A hazelnut mixture does double duty as a crust and topping in this berry-filled pie.

recipes.title: Peach-Apricot Cobbler
recipes.description: These two fruits combine beautifully to make a homey, warm-from-the-oven dessert.

recipes.title: Crumbly Apple Pie
recipes.description: A buttery brown sugar topping is a fabulous variation on this classic American apple pie.

recipes.title: Lemon Meringue Pie
recipes.description: Sweet meringue offsets the tart citrus flavor in this classic lemon-filled pie.

recipes.title: Miniature Chocolate Eclairs
recipes.description: No store-bought eclairs can compare to these bite-size pastries with their rich chocolate center.

recipes.title: Cherry Strudel
recipes.description: This old-world favorite gets a quick and easy update from ready-made phyllo pastry.

recipes.title: Chocolate Cheesecake
recipes.description: Impressive to look at, this dessert will surely please cheesecake and chocolate lovers alike!

recipes.title: Carrot Cake with Cream Cheese Icing
recipes.description: A nut-sprinkled cream cheese icing is the perfect foil for this moist, not-too-sweet carrot cake.

recipes.title: Best-Ever Chocolate Chip Cookies
recipes.description: These are about as good as cookies get, so make several batches and watch them disappear fast.

recipes.title: Chocolate-Pecan Brownies
recipes.description: Ready in less than an hour, these fudgy treats are delightfully sweet and rich.

recipes.title: Low-Carb Pumpkin Cheesecake Bars
recipes.description: Low-carb cheesecake bars with few ingredients. They taste like the inside of a pumpkin pie!

recipes.description: Traditional New England Indian pudding made with cornmeal (Indian meal), milk, eggs, and raisins.

recipes.description: A colonial squash and apple pudding with wine, rose-water, and spices.

recipes.title: Orange Pudding

recipes.title: Custard

recipes.description: An early American Christmas cookie recipe with coriander, ginger, and rose-water.

recipes.title: Molasses Gingerbread
recipes.description: Traditional colonial molasses gingerbread, beaten until light and white.

recipes.title: Gingerbread Cakes
recipes.description: Colonial gingerbread cakes with nutmeg, ginger, and pearl ash.

recipes.title: Queens Cake
recipes.description: An elegant colonial cake whipped to a cream, baked quickly in pans.

recipes.title: Pound Cake
recipes.description: The classic pound cake - one pound each of sugar, butter, flour, and eggs.

recipes.title: Shrewsbury Cake
recipes.description: A colonial adaptation of the English Shrewsbury cake, rolled into small cakes.

recipes.title: A Butter Drop
recipes.description: Colonial butter drop cookies baked in tin pans.

recipes.title: A Date With Melons
recipes.description: Cantaloupe rings filled with dates, raisins, and pistachios, topped with yogurt and honey.

recipes.title: Biblical Medley
recipes.description: A simple fruit salad with biblical fruits, honey, and nuts.

recipes.title: Baked Figs in Wine
recipes.description: Fresh figs baked with orange, wine, and honey.

recipes.title: Apricot Sauce
recipes.description: A sweet apricot sauce made with dried apricots, honey, and berries for topping cakes.

recipes.title: Chex Party Mix
recipes.description: Classic savory snack mix with Chex cereals, nuts, pretzels, and seasonings.

recipes.title: Lebanese Seven Spices
recipes.description: A classic Lebanese spice blend with black pepper, cumin, paprika, coriander, cloves, nutmeg, cinnamon, and cardamom.

recipes.title: Lebanese Lemon Salad Dressing
recipes.description: A simple and tangy Lebanese dressing with fresh lemon juice, olive oil, garlic, and salt.

recipes.title: Roasted Brussels Sprouts
recipes.description: Roasted Brussels sprouts retain a crisp-tender texture and gain caramelized flavor from browned edges. Choose boil-in-bag brown rice if you're in a hurry; it cooks in about 10 minutes. Menu serves 4.

recipes.title: Garlicky Broccoli Rabe
recipes.description: Broccoli rabe's bitterness is a pleasant foil to the sweet spices in the lamb dish. Pour the same wine you used for the lamb. You can make the cookies a couple of days in advance. Menu serves 6.

recipes.title: Aunt Peggy's Sour Cream Mashed Potatoes
Zucchini with Peppermint
recipes.description: Ricotta salata is a firm cheese common on the island. Salata means salty; the process for making the cheese involves salting traditional soft ricotta and aging it until it's firm. Purchase pane carasau (Sardinian music bread), a paper-thin flatbread, from GourmetSardinia (www.gourmetsardinia.com).

recipes.title: Lentil-Rice Salad with Pecans and Dried Cherries
Duff Goldman's Slightly Adapted Mamo's Potato Pancakes
Cheesy Garlic Bread
recipes.description: Classic cheesy garlic bread - perfect side for pasta dishes.

recipes.title: Roasted Asparagus
recipes.description: Simple roasted asparagus with honey-balsamic glaze.

recipes.title: Sriracha Zucchini
recipes.description: Spicy stir-fried zucchini with ginger, garlic, and Sriracha.

recipes.title: Honey Glazed Carrots
recipes.description: Sweet and tangy glazed carrots with honey and red wine vinegar.

recipes.title: Mediterranean Vegetables
recipes.description: Sautéed zucchini, onion, and bell pepper with Greek seasoning.

recipes.title: Lebanese Rice Pilaf
recipes.description: Classic Lebanese rice pilaf with orzo pasta, toasted almonds, and tahini.

recipes.title: Lebanese Garlic Sauce
recipes.description: A smooth, creamy garlic sauce made by blending garlic with olive oil.

recipes.title: Lebanese Garlic Sauce II
recipes.description: A mayonnaise-like garlic sauce made with an immersion blender.

recipes.title: Cilantro and Garlic Potatoes
recipes.description: Crispy fried potatoes tossed with a cilantro, garlic, cumin, and lemon dressing.

recipes.title: Fried Cauliflower with Tahini Sauce
recipes.description: Crispy deep-fried cauliflower florets served with a creamy tahini sauce.

recipes.title: Air-Fryer Carrots
recipes.description: I love roasting carrots to bring out their sweetness. I think thyme really complements the flavor of these air-fryer carrots, but feel free to mix it up and use other herbs, like rosemary or tarragon.

recipes.title: Air-Fryer Hard-Boiled Eggs
recipes.description: Air-fryer hard-boiled eggs make cooking eggs easier than we ever imagined, and they turn out just the same as stove-cooked eggs. It is a kitchen shortcut for the win!

recipes.title: Air-Fryer Potatoes
recipes.description: Red potatoes tossed with olive oil and herbs will become your new staple side. Crisp and fluffy air-fryer potatoes go with just about anything, from burgers to pork chops or prime rib.

recipes.title: Asparagus, Squash & Red Pepper Saute
recipes.description: The appealing vegetable trio is enlivened by a wine-scented saute.

recipes.title: Pumpkin Hummus
recipes.description: This perfectly delicious pumpkin hummus dip is a beautiful blend of creamy, decadent hummus and warm, autumnal pumpkin.

recipes.title: Green Beans Amandine
recipes.description: It's hard to improve on the taste of fresh green beans, but this recipe for green beans amandine does it. The final dish looks fancy without requiring fancy cooking skills.

recipes.title: Lemon-Parmesan Broiled Asparagus
recipes.description: These special spears are packed with flavor, thanks to the lemon-garlic dressing they're tossed in before roasting. It's a simple, quick side that goes with almost anything.

recipes.title: Maple-Gingerroot Vegetables
recipes.description: My family loves this recipe because it brings out the lovely flavors of the vegetables. Even my children enjoy it

recipes.title: Roasted Asparagus
recipes.description: This roasted asparagus recipe is made in a foil packet in the oven, keeping the spears bright and green with a consistently crisp texture.

recipes.title: Pimiento Green Beans
recipes.description: Here's an easy way to turn everyday green beans into a special side dish. Pimientos, Parmesan cheese and chicken broth add savory flavor and a dash of color.

recipes.title: Roasted Fall Vegetables
recipes.description: I love serving this tender veggie side dish as part of a comforting dinner on a chilly night. The cayenne pepper lends zippy flavor that's not overpowering.

recipes.title: Roasted Peppers and Cauliflower
recipes.description: Caramelization really enhances the flavors in this easy side dish. The seasoned, roasted peppers and cauliflower are just right with nearly any main course.

recipes.title: Zucchini and Summer Squash Side Dish
recipes.description: I’m trying to cut my risk for cardiac disease by changing the way I eat. This colorful sauteed zucchini and summer squash side dish is packed with as much nutrition as fresh-picked flavor!

recipes.title: Tabbouleh
recipes.description: Take a break from green leaf salads, and enjoy a bright, lively tabbouleh salad. This parsley-and-bulgur salad tastes great on its own, and it pairs well with foods from Middle Eastern and Mediterranean cuisines.

recipes.title: Veggie Kabobs
recipes.description: Grilling is a delightful way of preparing the season's freshest produce. The zesty Italian marinade adds just the right amount of spice to these veggie kabobs.

recipes.title: Bacon-Corn Stuffed Peppers
recipes.description: Filled with corn, salsa, green onions, mozzarella cheese and bacon, these grilled pepper halves are sure to liven up your next cookout. They have a wonderful taste and give a fun twist to the usual corn on the cob.

recipes.title: Oven-Fried Squash
recipes.description: Our oven-fried squash recipe is about as easy as they come. It's a crispy, crunchy way to use a bumper crop of summer squash.

recipes.title: Beans, Bacon & Tomato Bake
recipes.description: Bacon, tomatoes and lima beans combine for a nutrient-packed side dish that makes the perfect accompaniment to turkey.

recipes.title: Mexican-Style Pinto Beans
recipes.description: This Mexican-Style pinto beans recipe delivers rich, savory flavor and incredible versatility

recipes.title: Carrots and Snow Peas
recipes.description: This is without question my favorite side dish, both for flavor and ease of preparation. Sherry adds an amazing spark to the vegetables.

recipes.title: Cauliflower Mash
recipes.description: This quick and easy mashed cauliflower is a wonderful alternative to same-old mashed spuds, and it's healthier, too!

recipes.title: Cilantro Ginger Carrots
recipes.description: Peppery-sweet ginger and cooling cilantro have starring roles in this colorful side of crisp-tender carrots. The veggie goes from pan to plate in a twinkling.

recipes.title: Cilantro Potatoes
recipes.description: Fresh cilantro gives an exotic Syrian-style flavor to these easy, delicious skillet potatoes. They’re a creative complement to Mom’s tangy kabobs.

recipes.title: Colcannon
recipes.description: Putting together your St. Patrick's Day feast? Make sure there's room for colcannon, one of Ireland's most famous potato dishes, on the table.

recipes.title: Confetti Quinoa
recipes.description: If you have never tried quinoa, start with my easy side, brimming with colorful veggies. I serve it with orange-glazed chicken.

recipes.title: Corn Okra Creole
recipes.description: This dish is representative of my area of the country, and particularly the Texas-Louisiana border. The okra, corn and Creole seasonings are all popular here.

recipes.title: Cranberry Wild Rice Pilaf
recipes.description: This tender side dish is perfect for the holidays or any time you want to add a special touch. Dried cranberries, currants and almonds serve up color and texture. My co-workers all make this rice pilaf for their families.

recipes.title: Dutch Beets
recipes.description: Even people who typically shy away from beets will polish these off. This healthy canned vegetable recipe is quick to make, too, since you start with canned beets.

recipes.title: Quinoa Tabbouleh
recipes.description: We put a gluten-free twist on a classic Middle Eastern salad by using quinoa instead of bulgur. Our quinoa tabbouleh recipe features a protein-packed superfood, crisp veggies, fresh herbs and an easy lemon vinaigrette.

recipes.title: Eggplant Fries
recipes.description: My kids love this snack

recipes.title: Fiesta Corn and Beans
recipes.description: Bursting with southwestern flavors, the zesty veggie medley here can be served as a side dish or a meatless meal-in-one. The dollop of yogurt is a cool, creamy finishing touch.

recipes.title: Sauteed Cabbage
recipes.description: When I was young, my family grew our own cabbages. It was fun to put the cabbage to use in the kitchen, just as I did with this comforting side. With potatoes, deviled eggs and cornbread, fried cabbage tastes like home.

recipes.title: Garden-Fresh Rainbow Chard
recipes.description: Chard, a member of the beet family, is prized for its green leaves and colorful stalks. Stir up these good-for-you greens with garlic and red onion.

recipes.title: Garlic Asiago Cauliflower Rice
recipes.description: The garlic seasoning and Asiago really pack a punch, making this five-ingredient low-carb side dish a real weeknight winner.

recipes.title: German Red Cabbage
recipes.description: This inexpensive red cabbage recipe makes a tender, tasty vegetable side dish. It's traditionally German, but it pairs well with all kinds of foods, in every season.

recipes.title: Gouda Mixed Potato Mash
recipes.description: Everything's better with cheese, right? This cheesy two-potato mash is no exception. If you cube the cheese, you’ll discover delicious pockets of melted cheese throughout the dish.

recipes.title: Green Beans in Red Pepper Sauce
recipes.description: For easy veggies, I make a simple sauce of sweet red peppers, almonds and parsley. We also like this sauce with zucchini or roasted cauliflower.

recipes.title: Grilled Pattypans
recipes.description: Just a few minutes and a handful of ingredients are all you’ll need for this scrumptious side dish. Hoisin sauce and rice wine vinegar give grilled pattypans Asian flair.

recipes.title: Grilled Street Corn
recipes.description: Mexican food is my grandmother’s favorite. I wanted a perfect side for her legendary tacos, and this chile-lime grilled corn turned out to be just right.

recipes.title: Honey Garlic Green Beans
recipes.description: Green beans are a reliable standby, but they can seem ordinary on their own. Just a couple of extra ingredients give them a sweet and salty attitude. This is definitely my family's favorite way to enjoy them.

recipes.title: Honey-Thyme Butternut Squash
recipes.description: This golden, honey-sweetened squash is just as hearty and comforting as your favorite potato dish. With its bright color, it makes an attractive side for special autumn meals.

recipes.title: Couscous and Broccoli
recipes.description: This stovetop couscous and broccoli recipe delivers bright, citrusy flavor without dirtying a single extra pot.

recipes.title: Lemon Parmesan Orzo
recipes.description: A splash of lemon and a shower of chopped parsley make this orzo one of my family's most requested springtime sides. It's fantastic with chicken, pork and fish, or you can eat it on its own as a light lunch.

recipes.title: Mashed Peppery Turnips
recipes.description: I created this recipe in an attempt to use up a great turnip harvest from our garden, and to lighten up one of our favorite dishes. By using turnips in place of potatoes, I made a low-carb side. Now we rarely serve plain mashed potatoes!

recipes.title: Mediterranean Cauliflower
recipes.description: I adapted a recipe I received from a friend to make this delicious

recipes.title: Olive Oil Mashed Potatoes with Pancetta
recipes.description: Classic American mashed potatoes take a trip to Italy with the flavors of olive oil, garlic, and pancetta.

recipes.title: Parmesan-Roasted Broccoli
recipes.description: Broccoli and cheese are the simple but shining stars in this Parmesan-roasted broccoli recipe that really couldn't be easier

recipes.title: Quinoa and Peas
recipes.description: In this speedy and nutritious quinoa and peas bowl, protein-rich quinoa is paired with sweet green peas, drizzled with olive oil, and seasoned with salt and pepper.

recipes.title: Red Potatoes with Beans
recipes.description: You can serve this homey blend of fresh green beans, potato wedges and chopped red onion hot or cold. Either way, this easy side dish makes a pleasing accompaniment to Mom's meat loaf or almost any other meat.

recipes.title: Roasted Asparagus and Leeks
recipes.description: No vegetable says spring quite like asparagus. In this recipe, we combine pretty green spears with leeks. Crushed red pepper adds a bit of zest.

recipes.title: Roasted Fennel and Peppers
recipes.description: Fennel makes for a tasty change of pace in this versatile side that goes nicely with grilled meats. Best of all, it's full of flavor and easy to do

recipes.title: Roasted Pumpkin and Brussels Sprouts
recipes.description: While traveling to Taiwan, I had the pleasure of trying a unique vegetable dish that included fresh pumpkin. It inspired me to roast pumpkin with Brussels sprouts.

recipes.title: Roasted Rosemary Cauliflower
recipes.description: Roasting the cauliflower really brings out its flavor in this side dish. Even folks who aren't cauliflower lovers like it this way.

recipes.title: Shredded Gingered Brussels Sprouts
recipes.description: Even people who normally don't care for Brussels sprouts will ask for a second helping of these.

recipes.title: Smoky Cauliflower
recipes.description: The smoked Spanish paprika gives a simple side of roasted cauliflower extra depth. This is definitely a favorite.

recipes.title: Spaghetti Squash with Tomatoes and Olives
recipes.description: This squash is outstanding as a side dish, but you can also top it with canned tuna to create a simple, healthy main dish. It's easy and so tasty!  I like to use my own canned tomatoes for the best flavor.

recipes.title: Spiced Carrots & Butternut Squash
recipes.description: When I've got a lot going on, my slow cooker is my go-to tool for cooking veggies. The sweetness of the squash and carrots really complements the spicy seasonings.

recipes.title: Spicy Grilled Eggplant
recipes.description: This side dish goes well with any meat you might also be grilling. Thanks to the Cajun seasoning, the zesty eggplant gets more attention than an ordinary veggie. —Greg Fontenot, The Woodlands, Texas

recipes.title: Spring Asparagus
recipes.description: This fresh and colorful side dish is delicious served warm or cold. I get lots of compliments on the homemade dressing.

recipes.title: Stewed Zucchini and Tomatoes
recipes.description: A fresh take on traditional vegetable sides, this make-ahead dish stars zucchini, tomatoes and green pepper. Bubbly cheddar cheese adds a down-home feel.

recipes.title: Sauteed Zucchini
recipes.description: Sauteed zucchini is a near-perfect side dish. It’s light and fresh-tasting, goes with almost anything and best of all, it comes together in just minutes.

recipes.title: Crockpot Stuffing
recipes.description: This vegetarian Crockpot stuffing is a keeper. It has all the classic flavor, but it's cooked in a slow cooker for a moist, fluffy stuffing that leaves your oven free for other dishes.

recipes.title: Sweet Potato Carrot Crisp
recipes.description: Sweet potatoes take a different twist in this whipped side dish that pairs them with carrots. Subtly sweet, it has just a hint of garlic, while the nut and crumb topping adds a fun crunch to any holiday meal.

recipes.title: Vegetable Barley Saute
recipes.description: This wonderful side dish can easily be turned into a hearty entree by adding cooked chicken.

recipes.title: Buttermilk Mashed Potatoes
recipes.description: Buttermilk mashed potatoes are just as creamy and fluffy as traditional mashed potatoes and require little (or no!) butter. Our recipe includes a little garlic to add a sweet, rich character to the tangy mash.

recipes.title: Grilled Broccoli
recipes.description: Coating broccoli in a lemon juice marinade and a layer of Parmesan, then hitting it with a smoky char, makes for a showstopper of a grilled broccoli side dish.

recipes.title: Roasted Carrots and Onions
recipes.description: Season roasted carrots and onions with thyme, pepper and a splash of vinegar for a lovely, balanced vegetable side dish.

recipes.title: Seasoned Green Beans
recipes.description: A delicious meal is more than just an impressive main. Our seasoned green beans prove just how effective a knockout side dish can be, without taking more than 10 minutes to make.

recipes.title: Grilled Stuffed Zucchini
recipes.description: Grilled stuffed zucchini is filled with a light and savory blend of sauteed vegetables, breadcrumbs, melty cheese and fresh mint.

recipes.title: Succotash
recipes.description: This succotash recipe has everything that makes Southern cooking irresistible: ham hocks, beans, vegetables and herbs. It's easily customizable too, so you can add pretty much anything from your vegetable garden.

recipes.description: A southern-style grits casserole with cheese, eggs, and green chiles.

recipes.title: Green Chile Gnocchi
recipes.description: Hominy grits gnocchi with green chiles and cheddar cheese.

recipes.title: Basic Barley
recipes.description: Simple pearled barley cooked with butter and walnuts.

recipes.title: Fava Beans Corinthian
recipes.description: Young fava beans fried in seasoned flour and served with lemon.

recipes.title: Our Fava Beans
recipes.description: Shelled fava beans sauteed with onion, garlic, and basil, finished with pistachio nuts.

recipes.title: Apple and Eve Beets
recipes.description: A casserole of beets and apples with honey and cinnamon.

recipes.title: Carrots and Turnips Zebulun
recipes.description: Roasted carrots and turnips with honey, olive oil, and fresh herbs.

recipes.title: Naomi's Carrot-Cheese Bake
recipes.description: Steamed carrots and leeks baked with a cheese sauce and toasted almonds.

recipes.title: Aaron McCargo Jr.'s Steak Fajita Chili
Anasazi and Black Bean Chili
recipes.description: Slightly sweet red-and-white Anasazi beans contrast with robust black beans in flavor and color. You can substitute pinto beans for the Anasazi beans if you prefer.

recipes.title: Creamy Carrot Soup
recipes.description: I prepared this soup for my parents, who watch my daughter one afternoon a week. They absolutely loved its velvety sweetness. Garnish with shredded carrot and fresh mint.

recipes.title: Broccoli and Chicken Noodle Soup
recipes.description: If the broccoli florets are large, break into smaller pieces at the stalk instead of chopping them; they'll cook more quickly. Count on having dinner on the table in about 40 minutes, and serve this soup the moment it's done for the best results. In fact, if you wait, you'll find it gets thicker with time. If you have leftovers, you will want to thin the soup with a little chicken broth or milk to the desired consistency.

recipes.title: Broccoli and Chicken Noodle Soup
recipes.description: If the broccoli florets are large, break into smaller pieces at the stalk instead of chopping them; they'll cook more quickly. Count on having dinner on the table in about 40 minutes, and serve this soup the moment it's done for the best results. In fact, if you wait, you'll find it gets thicker with time. If you have leftovers, you will want to thin the soup with a little chicken broth or milk to the desired consistency.

recipes.title: Easy Creamy Broccoli Soup
recipes.description: A family-friendly favorite with Calcium and Vitamin D from Shedd's Spread Country Crock.

recipes.title: Black Bean Soup
recipes.description: Cumin and fiery serrano chile infuse this simple soup as it cooks, and a dollop of sour cream provides a refreshing foil for the spicy flavors. For less heat, seed the chile first or use a milder pepper, such as jalapeño. You can also omit the chile altogether, if you prefer.

recipes.title: Borlotti Minestrone
recipes.description: Borlotti beans—the Italian variety of cranberry beans—can be ordered from www.ranchogordo.com, among other online retailers. Why are time-honored varieties of beans finding fresh favor in home kitchens? 'I think heirloom beans taste better,' says Steve Sando, whose Rancho Gordo in Napa, California, grows and sells nearly 30 varieties of distinctive beans. 'Runner beans tend to be buttery. Christmas limas have a distinct chestnut taste, and the bean broth is beefy. Some types are like potatoes in texture; others are creamy.'

recipes.title: Barley and Beef Soup
recipes.description: Make this soup the night before to allow time for its flavors to develop. Pour hot servings into a thermos to take for lunch, or reheat individual portions in the microwave as needed. Serve the soup with crusty bread, crackers, or Spicy Whole-Wheat Pita Chips (page 90).

recipes.title: Simple Shrimp Gumbo
recipes.description: Cajun-style shrimp gumbo with a dark roux and vegetables.

recipes.title: Corn Soup
recipes.description: Creamy corn soup with fresh corn and Greek yogurt.

recipes.title: Chicken Tortilla Soup
recipes.description: Mexican-style chicken soup with tomatoes, salsa, and fresh cilantro.

recipes.title: Taco Soup
recipes.description: Hearty Tex-Mex soup with ground beef, beans, corn, and taco seasoning.

recipes.title: Lebanese Lemon Lentil Soup
recipes.description: A hearty lentil soup with vegetables, warm spices, and a creamy flour-butter roux finish.

recipes.title: Lebanese Red Lentil Soup
recipes.description: A smooth, pureed red lentil soup with cumin, cayenne, cilantro, and fresh lemon.

recipes.title: Chard Lentil Soup
recipes.description: A Lebanese-style soup with brown lentils, Swiss chard, potatoes, and a lemon-garlic finish.

recipes.title: Adas bil Hamod
recipes.description: A Lebanese lentil soup with spinach, caramelized onions, and lemon.

recipes.title: Lentil Lemon Soup II
recipes.description: A hearty Lebanese lentil soup with Swiss chard, made with a homemade herb broth.

recipes.title: Italian Veggie Beef Soup
recipes.description: A hearty Italian-seasoned soup loaded with ground beef, cabbage, and mixed vegetables in a rich tomato-beef broth.

recipes.title: Beef Black Bean Soup
recipes.description: A hearty slow cooker soup with ground beef, black beans, and rice. The corn, tomatoes, and green chilies give it a southwestern flair.

recipes.title: Beef Barley Lentil Soup
recipes.description: I serve this soup often to family and friends on cold nights, along with homemade rolls and a green salad. For variety, you can substitute jicama for the potatoes.

recipes.title: Beef Lentil Soup
recipes.description: This beef lentil soup combines tender ground beef, nutritious lentils, and fresh vegetables in a hearty broth, making it a comforting one-pot meal all year long.

recipes.title: Couscous Meatball Soup
recipes.description: This soup will warm you up and takes just 25 minutes of prep time, making it a perfect weeknight meal. &mdash;Jonathan Pace, San Francisco, California

recipes.title: Beef Mushroom Soup
recipes.description: Leftover roast beef gives this beef mushroom soup recipe an all-day-simmered taste in a weeknight-friendly timeframe.

recipes.title: Butternut Squash and Carrot Soup
recipes.description: I got this golden soup recipe from a friend. Sometimes I add a few slices of red pepper to change up the flavor a bit.

recipes.title: Cream of Asparagus Soup
recipes.description: We have a large asparagus patch and are able to freeze a lot for the year. My recipe highlights the flavor of the vegetable and is very easy to make.

recipes.title: Greens and Beans Turkey Soup
recipes.description: On winter evenings, we like nothing better than a piping hot bowl of soup. This one uses the turkey carcass to make a flavorful stock for the soup.

recipes.title: Italian Vegetable Beef Soup
recipes.description: Ground meat, veggies and broth come together in a snap in this recipe for Italian vegetable beef soup, which can be customized endlessly to use whatever ingredients you've got.

recipes.title: Pressure-Cooker Mexican Beef Soup
recipes.description: My family loves this stew, and I'm happy to make it since it's so simple! Serve the dish with cornbread to make the meal even more filling.

recipes.title: Pumpkin Curry Soup
recipes.description: This pumpkin curry soup infuses warm spices and hearty vegetables into the squash base, making it a delicious recipe to add to your comfort food rotation.

recipes.title: Beef Barley Soup
recipes.description: This hearty beef barley soup uses a simple blend of mirepoix, broth and steak to make a filling soup with basic ingredients.

recipes.title: Navy Bean Soup
recipes.description: When comfort food calls, make this hearty navy bean soup. It's soul-warming and filling, a perfect way to use up leftover ham.

recipes.title: Split Pea Soup
recipes.description: This split pea soup is hearty and soul-warming, just the thing for a cold day.

recipes.title: Slow-Cooker Split Pea Soup
recipes.description: Slow-cooker split pea soup is so easy, all you have to do is dump everything into the cooker. This soul-warming soup comes together in a snap!

recipes.title: Chicken Gnocchi Pesto Soup
recipes.description: Chicken gnocchi pesto soup is rich and filling, yet takes less than 30 minutes to make. Get the crusty bread ready

recipes.title: Easy Chipotle Cheddar Beef Chili
recipes.description: My family's favorite quick and easy chili recipe - perfect for cold fall and winter nights - delicious, hearty chili!

recipes.title: Easy Chili Lime Chicken
recipes.description: Serve to your family tonight, but don’t overlook this for a dinner party...simple to create, healthy, and looks pretty!

recipes.title: Honey Lime Chili Chicken Bowls
recipes.description: These bowls are the simplest to make and come together in under 45 minutes...a fun family dinner!

recipes.title: Slow cooker citrus chicken broth with tortillas and avocado
recipes.description: This zingy chicken broth recipe from Charlotte Pike makes the perfect nourishing lunch on a chilly day. Let it simmer away in your slow cooker, then serve with tortillas and avocado. Charlotte says: “Sopa de lima, as it’s called in Mexico, is a wonderfully zingy yet light chicken soup. Cooking the chicken thighs with the bones in, then removing them just before serving keeps the meat juicy and tender.” Recipe taken from Quick Prep Slow Cook by Charlotte Pike (Hamlyn £16.99) and tested by d

recipes.title: Southwestern Corn Chowder
recipes.description: A hearty corn chowder with bacon, potatoes, and green chiles.

recipes.title: Traditional Gazpacho
recipes.description: A classic cold Spanish soup with fresh vegetables and green chiles.

recipes.title: Chile Gumbo
recipes.description: A hearty gumbo with salt pork, black-eyed peas, and green chiles.

recipes.title: Sloppy Joes
recipes.description: A healthier take on the Big Mac, turning it into sloppy joes with beans and veggies for added lean protein.

recipes.title: Herbed Heritage Pork Loin with White Wine Reduction
recipes.description: We find Berkshire pork tender and juicy yet milder than the more robust Duroc. Both varieties are forgiving—partly because of their even marbling, the meat remains succulent even if slightly overcooked.

recipes.title: Lemon-Salmon Salad Sandwiches
recipes.description: Look for salmon in pouches in the canned fish section of the supermarket. A hearty white bread has sufficient heft to stand up to the sandwich filling. Slices from a bakery artisan loaf would dress up the sandwich even more.

recipes.title: Balsamic Pork with Shallots
recipes.description: This dish is reminiscent of bistro-style steak with shallot sauce. Serve with rice, egg noodles, or roasted potatoes.

recipes.title: Paprika Pork
recipes.description: Assorted colors of fresh peppers and paprika turn bottled marinara into a rich Hungarian goulash-style sauce for a quick, hearty weeknight supper.

recipes.title: Sausage and Roasted Pepper Pasta
recipes.description: Four assertive ingredients tossed with mild pasta make for a simple, satisfying supper. Fry in this recipe Bell peppers in a thin red-and-green sauce.

recipes.title: Swanson Pan Sautéed Chicken with Vegetables and Herbs
Bucatini alla Carbonara
recipes.description: Ragù alla Bolognese sauces are popular throughout Italy. The most prominent, even among residents of the city from which it hails, is cured pork. Bucatini is hollow spaghetti; guanciale (gwahn-CHAY-lay) is cured pork.

recipes.title: Fettuccine with Olive Oil, Garlic, and Red Pepper
Tagliatelle alla Bolognese
recipes.description: Meat-based pasta sauces are popular throughout Italy. The most prominent, ragù alla Bolognese, originated in the northern city of Bologna. Even among residents of the city from which it hails, different variations abound.

recipes.title: Ravioli with Herbed Ricotta Filling
recipes.description: You can shape the pasta and freeze it up to a month before cooking.

recipes.title: Spaghetti with Tomato Sauce
recipes.description: Although any purchased spaghetti will do, this dish becomes special enough for company if you use artisanal pasta (see 'Fantastic Pasta You Can Buy' on page 142).

recipes.title: Tex-Mex Calzones
recipes.description: Toss together a black bean salad to go with these family-friendly turnovers. Combine 1 (15-ounce) can rinsed and drained black beans, 1 cup quartered cherry tomatoes, 1/2 cup chopped red onion, 1/4 cup chopped celery, 2 tablespoons fresh lime juice, 2 tablespoons chopped fresh cilantro, and 1 tablespoon olive oil in a medium bowl; toss well to coat.

recipes.title: Speedy Cioppino
recipes.description: The bright taste of a lemon-dressed salad goes well with this seafood stew. Combine 1 1/2 tablespoons fresh lemon juice, 1 tablespoon extra-virgin olive oil, 1/2 teaspoon Dijon mustard, 1/2 teaspoon sugar, 1/4 teaspoon salt, 1/4 teaspoon black pepper, and 1 minced garlic clove, stirring with a whisk. Combine 6 cups gourmet salad greens, 1 cup halved cherry tomatoes, and 1/2 cup slivered red onion. Drizzle dressing over salad; toss gently to coat.

recipes.title: Fennel-Rubbed Pork with Shallot-Pomegranate Reduction
recipes.description: Serve with walnut couscous. Heat 1 teaspoon olive oil in a saucepan over medium-high heat. Add 1/2 cup chopped onion; sauté 3 minutes. Add 1 1/4 cups water, 1/2 teaspoon salt, and 1/8 teaspoon black pepper; bring to a boil. Stir in 1 cup couscous. Remove from heat; cover and let stand 5 minutes. Fluff with a fork. Sprinkle with 3 tablespoons toasted chopped walnuts and 2 tablespoons chopped fresh parsley.

recipes.title: Fiesta Chicken Tacos with Mango and Jicama Salad
recipes.description: Try this with a side of chipotle refritos. Combine 1 tablespoon fresh lime juice, 1 teaspoon minced canned chipotle chile in adobo sauce, 1 (16-ounce) can refried beans, and 1 minced garlic clove in a saucepan. Cook over medium heat 5 minutes or until thoroughly heated. Sprinkle with 2 teaspoons chopped fresh cilantro.

recipes.title: Spiced Pork Chops with Apple Chutney
recipes.description: Slender haricots verts are a pretty and quick-cooking complement to the meal. Heat 2 teaspoons olive oil in a large nonstick skillet over medium-high heat. Add 12 ounces haricots verts to pan; cook 3 minutes, stirring occasionally. Stir in 1/4 teaspoon salt, 1/8 teaspoon black pepper, and 2 thinly sliced garlic cloves; cook 5 minutes or until garlic is lightly browned.

recipes.title: Halibut with Coconut-Red Curry Sauce
recipes.description: A bed of seasoned rice with bok choy soaks up the sauce. Combine 2 2/3 cups water and 3/4 cup basmati rice in a medium saucepan; bring to a boil. Cover, reduce heat, and simmer 12 minutes. Stir in 2 cups chopped baby bok choy; cover and cook 8 minutes or until liquid is absorbed. Combine 1 1/2 tablespoons low-sodium soy sauce, 1 tablespoon fresh lime juice, 1/2 teaspoon sugar, and 1/2 teaspoon dark sesame oil; stir into rice mixture.

recipes.title: Spicy Asian Noodles with Chicken
recipes.description: Add a snow pea sauté to complete the meal. Heat 2 teaspoons canola oil in a large nonstick skillet over medium-high heat. Add 2 minced garlic cloves; sauté 15 seconds. Add 2 cups trimmed snow peas and 1 cup drained sliced water chestnuts; sauté 3 minutes or until crisp-tender. Remove from heat; stir in 1 tablespoon dark sesame oil.

recipes.title: Pan-Grilled Thai Tuna Salad
recipes.description: Try with a side of crunchy rice crackers. Prepare a refreshing dessert to follow the spicy salad. Spoon 1/2 cup coconut sorbet into each of 2 dessert bowls; top each serving with 2 tablespoons diced peeled mango and 1 tablespoon toasted flaked sweetened coconut.

recipes.title: Seared Scallops with Warm Tuscan Beans
recipes.description: Grilled garlic bread is great for dipping into the brothy beans. Heat a grill pan over medium heat. Brush 1 tablespoon olive oil evenly over 4 (1-ounce) slices French bread. Add bread to pan; cook 2 minutes on each side or until lightly browned. Rub one side of each bread slice with cut sides of a halved garlic clove.

recipes.title: Lemon Pepper Shrimp Scampi
recipes.description: Sautéed asparagus makes a fine accompaniment. Heat 2 teaspoons olive oil in a large nonstick skillet over medium-high heat. Add 1 pound trimmed asparagus spears; sauté 4 minutes. Sprinkle with 1/4 teaspoon salt and 1/8 teaspoon black pepper.

recipes.title: Flank Steak with Cucumber-Pepperoncini Relish
recipes.description: Pepperoncini peppers are yellow, wrinkled, and slightly spicy; we use both the chopped pickled pepper and pickling liquid to flavor the crunchy relish. Serve with soft pita wedges and a simple dill-garlic yogurt dip. Combine 1/2 cup plain 2% reduced-fat Greek-style yogurt (such as Fage), 2 teaspoons chopped fresh dill, 1 1/2 teaspoons fresh lemon juice, 1 teaspoon bottled minced garlic, 1/4 teaspoon salt, and a dash of ground red pepper.

recipes.title: Almond-Stuffed Chicken
recipes.description: The nutty, cheesy filling spices up chicken breasts and is a snap to make. Toast the almonds in a skillet before you cook the chicken and you'll have just one pan to clean. Serve with couscous and haricots verts.

recipes.title: Tomato-Ricotta Spaghetti
recipes.description: Roasting tomatoes intensifies their sweetness. We also tested this recipe with grated Parmigiano-Reggiano—it's a splurge that makes the difference.

recipes.title: Goat Cheese and Roasted Corn Quesadillas
recipes.description: Browning the corn caramelizes its sugars and deepens the taste of this dish. If you have fresh cilantro on hand, chop two tablespoons and stir it into the salsa. Serve with yellow rice and seasoned black beans for a tasty vegetarian meal.

recipes.title: Roasted Tilapia with Orange-Parsley Salsa
recipes.description: All parts of the orange—juice, rind, and pulp—flavor the quickly cooked fish. Substitute brown, basmati, or jasmine rice, if you prefer.

recipes.title: Asian-Spiced Veal Shanks
recipes.description: Slow cooking gives the meat a rich, mahogany-hued glaze. Serve over rice.

recipes.title: Zinfandel-Braised Leg of Lamb
recipes.description: Reducing the wine before placing it in the slow cooker gives a more rounded flavor. For a photo of this dish and suggested sides, please see Menu Suggestions, page 170.

recipes.title: Provençal Beef Stew
recipes.description: Chuck roast, a tough cut of meat, grows tender in the slow cooker. Serve this rustic stew with crusty bread and red wine—perhaps a Côtes du Rhône or Châteauneuf-du-Pape from southern France.

recipes.title: Curried Beef Short Ribs
recipes.description: Finishing this dish with lime zest and juice brightens its rich flavors.

recipes.title: Chicken Thighs with Olives and Tomato Sauce
recipes.description: Add capers along with the olives, parsley, and seasoning for a more briny flavor if you like. The parsley goes in last to keep its flavor and color intense.

recipes.title: Spice-Rubbed Pork Tenderloin
recipes.description: Allspice, nutmeg, and cinnamon—a combination often found in cold-weather baked goods—accent the savory rub mixture. Turn the pork frequently in the pan so the spices don't burn and grow bitter. The rub also works well with heritage pork such as Duroc or Berkshire. If you don't have whole allspice berries, use ground.

recipes.title: Asian-Marinated Flank Steak
recipes.description: The warmth of nutmeg helps round out the sweet, salty, and tangy marinade. Try it with grass-fed flank steak, if available. Serve this dish with steamed sugar snap peas and rice or soba noodles.

recipes.title: Grass-Fed Beef Tenderloin Steaks with Sautéed Mushrooms
recipes.description: At taste testing, we found that grass-fed beef's mineral-like flavor is enhanced by grilling.

recipes.title: Pork Tenderloin with Salty-Sweet Glaze
recipes.description: Amber agave nectar lends a light maple note. Tamari is a condiment reminiscent of soy sauce, which makes an acceptable substitute.

recipes.title: Tuna Pan Bagnat
recipes.description: A favorite in southern France, pan bagnat (pan ban-YAH) means 'bathed bread.' The bread in this sandwich is meant to absorb some liquid from the filling, so it's fine to assemble it entirely ahead of time. Serve with potato salad, pasta salad, or baked chips.

recipes.title: Tabbouleh with Chicken and Red Pepper
recipes.description: Use rotisserie or leftover chicken for this dish. If you're making the mixture a few hours or more in advance, store the cucumber and tomato separately and add them close to serving time to keep the salad at its best. Serve with Lemony Hummus with Spicy Whole-Wheat Pita Chips (page 90) for a flavorful, Middle East-themed light lunch.

recipes.title: Risotto-Style Fregula with Mushrooms, Abbamele, and Goat Cheese
recipes.description: Fregula is a small, toasted semolina pasta. Israeli couscous is a more readily available stand-in; you can also substitute buckwheat honey for abbamele.

recipes.title: Pork Chops with Fava Beans
recipes.description: Myrtle leaves have a flavor that's difficult to duplicate. If you can't find them, substitute bay leaves or a rosemary sprig. Use lima beans if fresh fava beans aren't available.

recipes.title: Tomato-Poached Eggs with Sardinian Music Bread
recipes.description: You'll find variations of this dish throughout Sardinia, but four ingredients always appear on hand: pane carasau, tomatoes, pecorino (or any sheep's-milk cheese), and eggs. Thin, crispy pane carasau is a staple in Sardinia but you can substitute crisp lavosh for a similar crunch. Chop whole peeled tomatoes in the can with kitchen shears for easy cleanup.

recipes.title: Grape Turkey Chili
recipes.description: Try this delicious, comforting dish, packed with antioxidant power. For a heartier meal, stir in a can or two of drained cannellini beans. Serve over warm polenta or rice, in taco shells, or in tortillas.

recipes.title: Balsamic Rosemary Pork Loin with Roasted Potatoes
Pork Chops with Rice and Beans
Roast Pork with Pear & Cranberry Pan Sauce
recipes.description: A unique dish for the holidays.

recipes.title: Pasta Puttanesca
recipes.description: Classic Italian pasta with tomatoes, olives, capers, and anchovies.

recipes.title: Arayes - Stuffed Pitas with Garlic Tahini Sauce
recipes.description: Middle Eastern stuffed pita pockets with spiced ground beef, served with creamy garlic tahini sauce.

recipes.title: Butter Chicken - 20 Minutes
recipes.description: Quick and flavorful Indian butter chicken with creamy tomato-based sauce.

recipes.title: Caramelized Onion and Garlic Spaghetti
recipes.description: Creamy pasta with deeply caramelized onions and garlic, topped with chili crisp.

recipes.title: Crock Pot Hawaiian Chicken
recipes.description: Slow cooker Hawaiian chicken with crushed pineapple and ginger.

recipes.title: Crockpot Hawaiian Chicken
recipes.description: Slow cooker Hawaiian chicken with bell peppers, pineapple cubes, and honey soy glaze.

recipes.title: Hachis Parmentier
recipes.description: Classic French comfort dish - ground beef stew topped with piped mashed potatoes, similar to shepherd's pie.

recipes.title: Hawaiian Chicken
recipes.description: Skillet Hawaiian chicken with pineapple, bell peppers, and sticky sweet sauce served over rice.

recipes.title: Sweet Hawaiian Crockpot Chicken
recipes.description: Easy slow cooker Hawaiian chicken with barbecue sauce and pineapple.

recipes.title: Cheesy Pasta Skillet
recipes.description: Quick one-pan cheesy pasta with ground beef and tortellini.

recipes.title: Goldie Chicken
recipes.description: Pan-seared chicken with a sweet and savory brown sugar ginger sauce.

recipes.title: Hamburger Steaks
recipes.description: Classic hamburger steaks with caramelized onions and brown gravy.

recipes.title: Philly Cheesesteak
recipes.description: Classic Philly cheesesteak sandwiches with sautéed onions, peppers, and melted provolone.

recipes.title: Spicy Shrimp Pasta
recipes.description: Quick pasta with garlic shrimp, brown sugar glaze, and parmesan cheese.

recipes.title: Double Decker Tacos
recipes.description: Taco Bell-inspired double decker tacos with refried beans holding soft and hard shells together.

recipes.title: Mexican Skillet Casserole
recipes.description: One-pan Mexican-style rice and beef dish with beans and cheese.

recipes.title: Chicken Nuggets
recipes.description: Homemade baked chicken nuggets with oat and panko coating.

recipes.title: Lemon Pepper Chicken
recipes.description: Quick skillet chicken with lemon pepper seasoning and red pepper flakes.

recipes.title: Skillet Lasagna
recipes.description: One-pot stovetop lasagna with oven-ready noodles, ricotta, and mozzarella.

recipes.title: Sweet and Spicy Salmon
recipes.description: Foil-baked salmon with honey, soy, ginger, and Sriracha glaze.

recipes.title: Broccoli Shrimp Stir Fry
recipes.description: Quick Asian stir fry with shrimp, broccoli, and savory sauce.

recipes.title: Garlic Butter Shrimp Pasta
recipes.description: Buttery garlic shrimp with spinach and parmesan over fettuccine.

recipes.title: Pizza Pasta
recipes.description: One-pot pasta with Italian sausage, pepperoni, and pizza sauce.

recipes.title: Creamy Chicken Spaghetti
recipes.description: Easy creamy pasta with rotisserie chicken, Rotel, and cream of mushroom soup.

recipes.title: Sloppy Joes
recipes.description: Classic homemade sloppy joes with tomato sauce and seasonings.

recipes.title: Shrimp and Grits
recipes.description: Classic Southern shrimp and grits with bacon, white wine, and vegetables.

recipes.title: Salmon Patties
recipes.description: Classic pan-fried salmon patties with cornmeal coating.

recipes.description: Baked chicken burritos topped with creamy sour cream-poblano sauce.

recipes.title: Kale and Feta Burrito
recipes.description: A healthy vegetarian burrito with sautéed kale, pinto beans, brown rice, and tangy feta.

recipes.title: Keto Chicken Alfredo

recipes.title: Keto Chicken Alfredo with Broccoli Bake
recipes.description: A cheesy, creamy one-skillet keto chicken alfredo baked with broccoli and topped with melted mozzarella.

recipes.title: Keto Chicken Alfredo Bake
recipes.description: This family-friendly Keto Chicken Alfredo with Broccoli includes layers of creamy and garlicky Alfredo sauce, steamed broccoli and cheese. Ready in 30 minutes with homemade or jarred sauce.

recipes.title: Keto Alfredo Sauce with Zoodles
recipes.description: Creamy keto alfredo sauce served over spiralized zucchini noodles with seared chicken breast.

recipes.title: Keto Chicken Alfredo with Zucchini Noodles
recipes.description: Keto chicken Alfredo with zucchini noodles tastes like a decadent low carb dinner any night of the week. Only 4.6g net carbs per serving.

recipes.title: Chicken Broccoli Alfredo Bake (Low Carb)
recipes.description: A delicious creamy chicken broccoli Alfredo dinner with a secret boost of protein coming from the creamy sauce!

recipes.title: Keto Chicken Alfredo Bake
recipes.description: When you make a casserole that starts with a sauce that you could straight-up drink, it is bound to be a winner. This is comfort food that never gets old.

recipes.title: Keto Chicken Alfredo Casserole
recipes.description: Keto Chicken Alfredo Casserole is an easy, cheesy low carb meal packed full of chicken, cheese, and cauliflower. It's the perfect keto dinner solution for feeding the whole family.

recipes.title: Keto Chicken Alfredo
recipes.description: Traditional Alfredo sauce served over chicken breasts and steamed broccoli! Who needs pasta?

recipes.title: Spaghetti Squash Meatball Casserole
