recipes.description: A hearty casserole featuring spaghetti squash, homemade seasoned meatballs, collard greens, spinach, and ricotta cheese topped with pasta sauce and mozzarella.

recipes.title: Zucchini Boats
recipes.description: Hollowed zucchini stuffed with seasoned ground beef, vegetables, and topped with melted cheddar cheese.

recipes.title: Greek Sloppy Joes
recipes.description: A Mediterranean twist on the classic sloppy joe with oregano-seasoned beef, romaine lettuce, and crumbled feta cheese on toasted kaiser rolls.

recipes.title: Orange Beef Lettuce Wraps
recipes.description: Asian-inspired lettuce wraps featuring seasoned ground beef with orange marmalade, ginger, and sriracha, served over brown rice in crisp lettuce cups.

recipes.title: Beef Barley Skillet
recipes.description: A hearty one-skillet meal with ground beef, quick-cooking barley, and vegetables in a savory tomato-chili sauce.

recipes.title: Easy Cuban Picadillo
recipes.description: A classic Cuban ground beef dish with olives and raisins in a savory-sweet tomato sauce, served over rice.

recipes.title: Brown Rice Stuffed Peppers
recipes.description: Classic stuffed peppers filled with seasoned ground beef and brown rice in a light tomato sauce.

recipes.title: Best Hamburger
recipes.description: A simple, classic grilled hamburger with just salt and pepper seasoning - the way a good burger should be.

recipes.title: Stovetop Beef and Shells
recipes.description: A quick and satisfying pasta dish with seasoned ground beef in a simple tomato sauce, perfect for weeknight dinners.

recipes.title: Tortilla Pie
recipes.description: A layered Mexican-style pie with seasoned ground beef, ricotta cheese, and cheddar, baked between whole wheat tortillas.

recipes.title: Hearty Beef Sweet Potato Stew
recipes.description: A warming oven-baked stew with beef chuck, sweet potatoes, mushrooms, carrots, parsnips, and turnip. The homemade beef stock creates a rich, savory gravy.

recipes.title: Firehouse Chili
recipes.description: When a recipe intended to serve a group of hungry people passes the firehouse test, you know it's worth making. Hearty, zesty, spicy and downright delicious, this firehouse chili will be your go-to when you need something simmering on the stove for friends and family to fill bowls at their leisure.

recipes.title: Feta Mushroom Burgers
recipes.description: I got this recipe from my son-in-law and I tweaked it to make it healthier. The burgers are so quick to whip up on the grill on busy nights.

recipes.title: Spaghetti Pie
recipes.description: Easy spaghetti pie is a delicious and satisfying meal with all the flavor of a Sunday spaghetti supper, made weeknight-friendly.

recipes.title: Sloppy Joe Recipe
recipes.description: Who doesn't love a classic sloppy joe recipe? Customize your homemade sloppy joes by mixing in veggies or melting cheese on top.

recipes.title: Skillet Beef Tamales
recipes.description: I found something similar to this years ago and have recently added my own spin. Here’s the outcome: an easy, cheesy meal your family can't get enough of. We don't have to tell them it's healthy. —Deborah Williams, Peoria, Arizona

recipes.title: Chili Mac Casserole
recipes.description: This cheesy casserole uses several of my family's favorite ingredients, including macaroni, kidney beans, tomatoes and cheese. Just add a leafy salad for a complete meal. —Marlene Wilson, Rolla, North Dakota

recipes.title: Cheeseburger Pasta
recipes.description: Switch up your usual go-to cheeseburger dinner and make it in pasta form instead!

recipes.title: Spanish Rice with Ground Beef
recipes.description: For a fast and flavorful dinner, look no further than this Spanish rice with ground beef

recipes.title: Hearty Pita Tacos
recipes.description: A filling taco-style pita pocket loaded with ground beef, kidney beans, corn, and taco seasonings. A healthy twist on traditional tacos.

recipes.title: Garlic Spaghetti Squash with Meat Sauce and Tomato
recipes.description: I have reduced grains and other starches in my diet due to health reasons, so I was looking for filling, comforting meals without pasta or potatoes. When I was tinkering with this spaghetti squash recipe, I discovered something fun to eat!

recipes.title: Hamburger Casserole
recipes.description: This hamburger casserole recipe is such a hit it's traveled all over the country! My mother originated the recipe in Pennsylvania, I brought it to Texas when I married, I'm still making it in California, and my daughter treats her friends to this oldie in Colorado. It's hearty, yet simple to prepare. —Helen Carmichall, Santee, California

recipes.title: Italian Hot Dish
recipes.description: My husband had a poor perception of healthy food until he tried this beefy casserole. The combination of pasta, oregano, mushrooms and green peppers makes it a favorite healthy pasta recipe in our house.

recipes.title: Lettuce-Wrap Burgers
recipes.description: A lettuce-wrap burger offers all the best parts of a burger

recipes.title: Salisbury Steak
recipes.description: Salisbury steak makes an easy, cozy weeknight dinner. One whiff of the rich ground beef and savory mushroom sauce will bring the whole family to the table!

recipes.title: Korean Beef and Rice
recipes.description: If you like bulgogi, think of this Korean beef and rice recipe as the quick-and-dirty version. Using ground beef instead of sliced steak, it's ready in just 15 minutes, start to finish.

recipes.title: Texas Tacos
recipes.description: I created this recipe by combining a bunch of taco ingredients that my kids like. Once it’s ready, I often keep the beef mixture warm in a slow cooker so the kids can quickly fill taco shells after an afternoon of rigorous soccer practice.

recipes.title: Arrabbiata Sauce with Zucchini Noodles
recipes.description: This popular Italian dish is flavorful and spicy. We decided to re-create one of our favorite jarred sauces and serve over zucchini pasta for a lighter, healthier meal that's naturally gluten-free. The results were amazing!

recipes.title: Unstuffed Cabbage Rolls
recipes.description: Skip the hassle of rolling cabbage leaves with this easy unstuffed cabbage roll recipe. This one-skillet dish delivers the comforting taste of traditional cabbage rolls without the extra effort.

recipes.title: Zucchini Lasagna
recipes.description: When life gives you zucchini, make zucchini lasagna!

recipes.title: Meatball Cabbage Rolls
recipes.description: My mother often had these cabbage rolls simmering in her slow cooker when my family and I arrived at her house for weekend visits. The mouthwatering meatballs tucked inside made these stand out from any other cabbage rolls I've tried. —Betty Buckmaster, Muskogee, Oklahoma

recipes.title: Air-Fryer Pork Chops
recipes.description: Air-fryer pork chops are juicy, tender and incredibly easy to make. Paired with your favorite side dish, they’re perfect for weeknight dinners or special-occasion meals.

recipes.title: Beef Daube Provencal
recipes.description: This dish is perfect on cold winter days, especially after we have been out cutting wood or white-tail hunting.  If you are lucky enough to have venison, try it here for melt-in-your-mouth goodness.

recipes.title: Blackened Tilapia with Zucchini Noodles
recipes.description: I love quick and bright meals like this one-skillet wonder. The way it tastes, you'd think it takes a lot more effort, but it goes from prep to dinner table in half an hour. The recipe works well with any light fish, or even shrimp.

recipes.title: Cajun Shrimp
recipes.description: Spice up your weeknight meals with our quick and easy Cajun shrimp recipe.

recipes.title: Chicken Cacciatore
recipes.description: This chicken cacciatore recipe is simple

recipes.title: Garlic Herb Chicken
recipes.description: With fresh herbs and aromatics in the luscious sauce, this garlic herb chicken smells so good your neighbors might show up to dinner "by accident."

recipes.title: Chicken Nuggets
recipes.description: Packed with flavor and quick to make, this chicken nuggets recipe is so easy, you’ll never grab a bag of frozen nuggets at the store again.

recipes.title: Cod and Asparagus Bake
recipes.description: The lemon pulls this flavorful and healthy dish together. You can use grated Parmesan cheese instead of Romano if you'd like.

recipes.title: Cod with Hearty Tomato Sauce
recipes.description: Cod in tomato sauce is a sweet, flavorful recipe that goes excellently with nutty grains and starches such as brown rice or whole wheat pasta.

recipes.title: Crispy Dill Tilapia
recipes.description: Every week I try to serve a new healthy fish. With its fresh dill and delicious panko bread crumb herb crust, this dish with mild tilapia is a winner.

recipes.title: Cuban-Style Pork Chops
recipes.description: These are like Cuban sandwiches without the bread, so they’re a bit more elegant. Let your family customize the chops with pickles, mustard and other condiments.

recipes.title: Cucumber Coleslaw
recipes.description: I created this cucumber coleslaw recipe so I could use a julienne peeler I received as a gift. I had leftover sparkling wine, so I thought I'd try to use it over julienned cucumbers to make this refreshing slaw. It's a nice way to round out a brunch or picnic.

recipes.title: Salmon Alfredo
recipes.description: Salmon Alfredo is a simple yet elegant dinner that’s perfect for cozy weeknight meals or when entertaining dinner guests. Flaky salmon, hot fettuccine and a perfectly smooth Alfredo sauce come together for an easy restaurant-quality meal at home.

recipes.title: Beef Tenderloin Roast
recipes.description: This five-ingredient beef tenderloin roast is an elegant yet simple dish perfect for holiday gatherings or special family dinners. Add in your favorite herbs and spices to customize the flavor.

recipes.title: Pepper Steak
recipes.description: This delicious pepper steak recipe is perfect if you're on the hunt for a quick, nourishing, flavor-packed meal for your next weeknight dinner. Look no further!

recipes.title: Chicken Fajitas
recipes.description: Sizzling chicken fajitas are super easy to make and full of flavor. The secret is in the skillet, which can go from stove to table for restaurant-quality presentation.

recipes.title: Flavorful Salmon Fillets
recipes.description: Compliments are a sure thing when I fix these fabulous salmon fillets. A tasty marinade pumps up the flavor and keeps them moist and tender.

recipes.title: Fruity Pork Roast
recipes.description: I like using the slow cooker for our meals because it gives me time for other preparations, frees the oven, and it usually doesn't matter if you serve it later than planned. The fruit in this recipe, which I adapted, gives the pork a special flavor.

recipes.title: Garlic-Grilled Chicken with Pesto Zucchini Ribbons
recipes.description: The first time I substituted zucchini noodles for regular pasta, it was because I was trying to reduce carbohydrates and calories. Now I make them because we love the flavor and texture they bring to dishes. This dish is just as delicious if you substitute shrimp for the chicken.

recipes.title: Grilled Steak
recipes.description: These perfectly grilled steaks are finished with a robust garlic mixture that releases an incredible aroma. Whether you're cooking with charcoal or gas, we'll show you how long to grill steak and provide some helpful tips along the way.

recipes.title: Garlic-Mushroom Turkey Slices
recipes.description: My daughter is a picky eater, and even she likes this enticing dish! There’s minimal fat, and it’s delicious, easy and affordable for weeknight dining.

recipes.title: Ginger Honey Marinated Salmon
recipes.description: Ginger, garlic powder and green onion blend nicely for this marinated salmon. We've found it tastes even better when marinated in the fridge overnight. We also like to use this versatile mixture when grilling chicken!

recipes.title: Goat Cheese and Spinach Stuffed Chicken
recipes.description: This spinach-stuffed chicken breast recipe is special to me because it has so much flavor, yet not too many calories. I love Italian food, but most of the time it is too heavy. This is a healthy twist on an Italian dish!

recipes.title: Grilled Mahi Mahi
recipes.description: Instead of grilling the usual hamburgers or chicken breasts, prepare this grilled mahi mahi and reel in raves!

recipes.title: Grilled Teriyaki Chicken
recipes.description: Our grilled teriyaki chicken recipe features a simple homemade marinade that infuses the chicken with aromatic flavor. It's the perfect weeknight meal when served with rice or noodles.

recipes.title: Instant Pot Chili con Carne
recipes.description: Although multicookers can’t replace every tool in the kitchen, they sure are coming close. Chili con carne is one of our favorite dishes to re-create in them. This cooks up fast but tastes like it simmered all day!

recipes.title: Italian Turkey Cutlets
recipes.description: "Because I'm watching my weight, I've used this recipe for years," writes Janet Bumb of Beallsville, Maryland. "Served with a flavorful tomato sauce, these cutlets taste so good that my son, who is thin and doesn't need to worry about his weight, requests them for his birthday dinner!"

recipes.title: Kabobless Chicken and Vegetables
recipes.description: As the primary caregiver for my grandma, I am trying to cook healthier for her. I am fascinated with Mediterranean cuisine. It is much easier to have chicken and vegetables off the kabob, which inspired this sheet-pan dinner.

recipes.title: Lemon Feta Chicken
recipes.description: Bright lemon juice and tangy feta cheese ensure every bite of this tender, juicy lemon feta chicken is packed with flavor.

recipes.title: Lemon-Pepper Tilapia
recipes.description: Lemon-pepper tilapia is the kind of dish you can throw together on the spur of the moment. At just 20 minutes from start to finish, it's a great recipe to have in your repertoire.

recipes.title: Grilled Chicken Breasts
recipes.description: Learn how to grill chicken breast for the easiest summer dinner. The days of dull, dry chicken are over.

recipes.title: Naked Fish Tacos
recipes.description: This is one of my husband's all-time favorite meals. I've even converted some friends to fish after they've eaten this. I serve the dish with fresh melon when it's in season to balance the subtle heat of the cabbage mixture.

recipes.title: Pan-Seared Salmon
recipes.description: Pan-seared salmon is an elegant, wholesome entree that requires little time or effort. Add a side salad or simple green, and dinner is served.

recipes.title: Pineapple Smoothies
recipes.description: I found this recipe over 30 years ago. I've tried several diabetes-friendly recipes, and this is one of the best.

recipes.title: Cabbage Stir-Fry
recipes.description: The ginger comes through nicely in this colorful pork and napa cabbage stir-fry. Serve it over steamed rice or cooked noodles for a cozy-savory meal.

recipes.title: Pressure-Cooker Beef and Rice Cabbage Rolls
recipes.description: My family can't wait for dinner when I serve my tasty cabbage rolls. The dish comes together in a pinch and always satisfies.

recipes.title: Pressure Cooker Spice-Braised Pot Roast
recipes.description: Herbs and spices give the beef an excellent flavor. I often serve this roast over noodles or with mashed potatoes, using the juices as a gravy.

recipes.title: Rosemary Walnuts
recipes.description: My Aunt Mary started making this recipe years ago. Each time we visited, she would have a batch ready for us. The use of cayenne adds an unexpected zing to the savory combo of rosemary and walnuts. When you need a good housewarming or hostess gift, double the batch and save half for yourself.

recipes.title: Salmon with Horseradish Pistachio Crust
recipes.description: Impress everyone at your table with this elegant but easy salmon that's delicious and nutritious. You can substitute scallions for shallots if you like.

recipes.title: Slow-Cooker Al Pastor Bowls
recipes.description: You'll love this easy version of a traditional Mexican favorite. Serve this al pastor bowl over rice or in tortillas with your favorite toppings.

recipes.title: Spinach and Feta Stuffed Chicken
recipes.description: My chicken bundles are simple, clean and comforting. Serve them with wild rice and green beans for one of our favorite meals.

recipes.title: Sweet Orange Chicken
recipes.description: This orange chicken recipe with orange marmalade is a family favorite. It's sure to be a hit at your next get together!

recipes.title: Tangy Tender Pork Chops
recipes.description: I have used this recipe for many years and always get compliments when I serve it. The saucy onion-and-pepper topping compliments the chops.

recipes.title: Flank Steak
recipes.description: With an overnight soy sauce marinade, a quick sear on a hot grill and the correct slicing technique (always against the grain), you can take a lean flank steak and make it oh-so-tender.

recipes.title: Tex-Mex Popcorn
recipes.description: Spicy Southwest seasoning makes this snackin'-good popcorn ideal for any fiesta.

recipes.title: Turkey in Cream Sauce
recipes.description: I've been relying on this recipe for tender turkey since I first moved out on my own years ago. I serve it whenever I invite new guests to the house, and I'm constantly writing out the recipe.

recipes.title: Asian Turkey Lettuce Wraps
recipes.description: These Asian turkey lettuce wraps combine a saucy turkey-and-rice filling with low-calorie tender lettuce leaves.

recipes.title: Baked Haddock
recipes.description: Fish is a fast main course for a meal, and this baked haddock recipe takes less than 30 minutes to prepare. Simple ingredients combine to form a tasty topping that adds flavor to this mild and affordable fish.

recipes.title: Baked Tilapia
recipes.description: Your weeknight fish dinner doesn't get much easier or tastier than with this 20-minute baked tilapia recipe.

recipes.title: Basil-Lemon Chicken
recipes.description: Even though I'm not known for my green thumb, I've somehow managed to keep a kitchen herb garden going. I chose this skillet lemon basil chicken to debut my first batch of fresh herbs.

recipes.title: Sausage Asparagus Pasta
recipes.description: If you're looking for a super-fast, nourishing dinner you can make on a Tuesday, sausage asparagus pasta might be your new go-to weeknight meal.

recipes.title: Bulgur Jambalaya
recipes.description: I like making this dish because it allows me to stay on track for my weight loss without giving up foods I love.

recipes.title: Caesar Salmon with Roasted Tomatoes & Artichokes
recipes.description: This is my "go to" recipe for quick dinners, family or guests. It's colorful, healthy, easy to prepare and absolutely delicious. The best part is it only calls for five ingredients!

recipes.title: Dirty Rice with Ground Beef
recipes.description: Dirty rice with ground beef is a departure from the typical chicken liver-centric version, but it's just as tasty. This recipe also cooks in just 30 minutes, quick enough for an improvised weeknight meal.

recipes.title: Chicken Butternut Chili
recipes.description: At our house, we just love a good comforting, hearty, tomato-based chili with bold flavors! This unique chili is loaded with veggies and flavor. You can also prepare the recipe in the slow cooker. Just add ingredients to the crock and cook over high heat for about 4 hours.

recipes.title: Chicken Cordon Bleu Pasta
recipes.description: This chicken cordon bleu pasta recipe blends French richness and Italian comfort in one golden-topped, bubbling dish.

recipes.title: Chicken-Stuffed Cubanelle Peppers
recipes.description: Here's a different take on traditional stuffed peppers. I substituted chicken for the beef and used Cubanelle peppers in place of the green peppers that are usually featured in such a dish.

recipes.title: Chicken Veggie Skillet
recipes.description: I invented this chicken and veggie dish to use up extra mushrooms and asparagus. My husband suggested I write it down because it's a keeper.

recipes.title: Chicken with Celery Root Puree
recipes.description: Celeriac, or celery root, is a root veggie that combines well with other seasonal ingredients and adds nice texture and flavor to this puree.

recipes.title: Clam Chowder
recipes.description: Enjoy a big bowl of award-winning clam chowder, a traditional favorite from the New England coast. It's creamy and chock-full of clams, potatoes, bacon and more.

recipes.title: Pork Loin with Gravy
recipes.description: Transform a simple pork loin into a tender, flavorful feast with this easy slow-cooker recipe.

recipes.title: Pan-Seared Red Snapper
recipes.description: Red snapper recipes are always great as a quick dinner idea. Our recipe features a simple, satisfying and crunchy Parmesan and lemon-pepper crust. Perfect for those busy weeknights!

recipes.title: Chili Lime Shrimp
recipes.description: Chili lime shrimp with crispy tortilla chips packs the spiced flavor into a sheet-pan dinner that's ready in no time.

recipes.title: Dill Cucumbers
recipes.description: Whether you call them quick pickles or cucumber salad, dill cucumbers taste fresh and crisp, and take no time at all to prepare.

recipes.title: Curry Turkey Stir-Fry
recipes.description: Just open the fridge and go to town making this throw-together curry. We prefer turkey, but if you like chicken, shrimp, even bean sprouts and carrots, by all means, add them.

recipes.title: Mediterranean Chicken
recipes.description: This quick and easy skillet Mediterranean chicken recipe is a one-pan dinner that will make you feel as if you are vacationing seaside in Greece.

recipes.title: Slow-Cooker Pork Medallions
recipes.description: Slow-cooker pork medallions are simmered for less than two hours, meaning they come out perfectly cooked.

recipes.title: Fiery Stuffed Poblanos
recipes.description: I love Southwest-inspired cuisine, but the dishes are often unhealthy. As a dietitian, I try to come up with nutritious twists on recipes, which is how my stuffed peppers dish was born.

recipes.title: Flaky Whole Wheat Biscuits
recipes.description: Whole wheat flour gives these biscuits a nutty, homey flavor. Ever since I started making these, white flour biscuits just don't taste as good! Pair them with soup or slather them with whipped cream and sweetened berries for a dessert treat.

recipes.title: Garlic Pumpkin Seeds
recipes.description: Wondering what to do with all those pumpkin seeds guests will be scooping out at your pumpkin-carving party? This yummy, microwave-easy recipe is the answer! Save some for yourself before they're gone!

recipes.title: Ginger Salmon with Brown Rice
recipes.description: Oh what fun it is to prepare a heavenly salmon with only five ingredients. My dressing serves as a glaze and a flavor-booster for the rice.

recipes.title: Ginger Steak Fried Rice
recipes.description: Perfect for an end-of-the-week meal, this sensational dish comes together quickly with leftover rice. I learned a great tip for the steak recently: Partially freeze it, and it will be easy to cut into thin slices.

recipes.title: Grecian Pasta & Chicken Skillet
recipes.description: We love a homemade meal at the end of the day. But the prep involved? Not so much. My Greek-inspired pasta is lemony, herby and, thankfully, easy.

recipes.title: Grilled Beef Chimichangas
recipes.description: I created this recipe when I didn't have the ingredients for my go-to dish. After making this, it became my new favorite!

recipes.title: Grilled Salmon Fillet
recipes.description: Grilling salmon is a fantastic way to enjoy this rich, buttery fish

recipes.title: Halibut Fish Tacos
recipes.description: Halibut fish tacos

recipes.title: Herb Salmon
recipes.description: Looking for a healthy and delicious dinner that is truly ready in less than 30 minutes? Herb salmon should be your go-to meal for any busy weeknight, but it is elegant enough for guests. An herb and garlic olive oil drizzled over the top before roasting adds savory flavor.

recipes.title: Hoisin Turkey Lettuce Wraps
recipes.description: I'm married to a marathon runner, which means dinners need to be healthy but flavor-packed. These low-carb wraps are quick and easy. He loves the health aspect, I love the taste!

recipes.title: Honey Balsamic Chicken
recipes.description: This balsamic chicken is a recipe I adapted from a cookbook that featured quick and easy recipes. I adjusted the seasonings somewhat and added a bit more honey to better suit my tastes.

recipes.title: In-a-Pinch Chicken & Spinach
recipes.description: I needed a fast supper while babysitting my grandchild. I used what my daughter-in-law had in the fridge and turned it into what's now one of our favorite chicken and spinach recipes.

recipes.title: Sausage Orzo
recipes.description: Sausage and pasta sounds like a rich dish, but using whole wheat orzo and turkey sausage helps lighten it up. This sausage and orzo recipe bursts with summery flavor thanks to the addition of fresh tomato and basil.

recipes.title: Lemon Thyme Chicken
recipes.description: Lemon thyme chicken is an easy and flavorful dish that combines the bright, zesty taste of lemon with the earthy aroma of thyme.

recipes.title: Makeover Turkey Burgers with Peach Mayo
recipes.description: The unique fruit and mayo combination puts this burger over the top. You can also substitute nectarines for the peaches. They're both delicious!

recipes.title: Marinated Steak & Pepper Fajitas
recipes.description: These fajitas are the best, and a much healthier version of the typically pan-fried ones you find in restaurants. I like to serve them in flatbreads instead of tortillas.

recipes.title: Meaty Slow-Cooked Jambalaya
recipes.description: This recipe makes a big batch of delicious, meaty gumbo. Stash some away in the freezer for days you don't feel like cooking.

recipes.title: Mediterranean Turkey Skillet
recipes.description: Our one-pot Mediterranean turkey skillet recipe, filled with lean ground turkey, a rainbow of vegetables and savory black beans, is a weeknight winner.

recipes.title: Old Bay Crispy Kale Chips
recipes.description: Here in East Hampton, NY, harvest time means big bunches of kale from local growers. These crunchy kale chips are delicious, super healthy and easy to make. I make them with seasoning to take the flavor up a notch. For extra zip, add a dash of cayenne pepper.

recipes.title: Sheet-Pan Chicken and Veggies
recipes.description: Our sheet-pan chicken and veggies recipe features herby chicken thighs, roasted red potatoes and spinach in one no-muss, no-fuss dish. The best part: Cleanup is a breeze!

recipes.title: Parmesan Chicken with Artichoke Hearts
recipes.description: I've liked the chicken and artichoke combo for a long time. Here's my own lemony twist. With all the praise it gets, this dinner is so much fun to serve.

recipes.title: Peppered Tuna Kabobs
recipes.description: When we barbecue, we like to wow our guests, so dogs and burgers are out! We make tuna skewers topped with salsa

recipes.title: Pork Tenderloin Stew
recipes.description: This thick and creamy pork tenderloin stew is one that my family requests often. It does an especially good job of warming us up on cold winter days.

recipes.title: Pork with Sweet Potatoes
recipes.description: With sweet potatoes, dried cranberries and apple slices, this colorful pork dish is especially popular during fall and winter.

recipes.title: Pulled Chicken Sandwich
recipes.description: This slow-cooker pulled chicken sandwich recipe delivers sweet and tangy goodness to folks who love Southern barbecue and also love easy cooking.

recipes.title: Easy Coq au Vin
recipes.description: Introduce French bistro vibes to your table with our easy coq au vin, a classic French stew you can whip up on a weeknight.

recipes.title: Grilled Salmon in Foil
recipes.description: Grilled salmon in foil is one of the easiest, fastest ways to make dinner with hardly any mess! Salmon steams inside the foil packet, while tomatoes and onions soak up the curry powder used to season the salmon.

recipes.title: Salmon Veggie Packets
recipes.description: I feel the spirit of Julia Child when I make lemon-pepper salmon en papillote (in parchment). It’s the first French recipe I learned, and the delightful little packages are family-friendly.

recipes.title: Sassy Salsa Meat Loaves
recipes.description: Here's a twist on classic meat loaf. You can make these loaves ahead, and they’ll last for a few days. Make meat loaf sandwiches with the leftovers, buns and a little Monterey Jack cheese.

recipes.title: Saucy Pork Chop Skillet
recipes.description: Skillet pork chops make easy comfort food. We have them with a salad and fruit. If you've got fresh green beans or steamed broccoli, go for it.

recipes.title: Sausage Spinach Pasta Bake
recipes.description: Easier than a lasagna but just as satisfying, sausage spinach pasta bake is a comforting casserole loaded with a creamy tomato sausage ragù and the equivalent of a whole pound of raw spinach, all topped with gooey cheese.

recipes.title: Sesame Turkey Stir-Fry
recipes.description: I really like the rich taste of sesame oil in this Thai-inspired dish. If you don't have it, canola oil does the trick, too. To get a similar nuttiness, toss in a handful sliced almonds before serving.

recipes.title: Skillet Pork Chops with Apples & Onion
recipes.description: Pork chops with apples and onions is a timeless pairing; the combination of the simple ingredients yields a savory entree that's sweet, tart and perfectly saucy.

recipes.title: Slow-Cooker Beef Bourguignon
recipes.description: Slow-cooker beef bourguignon simmers all day so you can enjoy a traditional French dinner tonight.

recipes.title: Slow-Cooker Butter Chicken
recipes.description: Creamy, tangy, tomatoey and mildly spiced slow-cooker butter chicken is a beloved Indian dish that's easy to recreate at home.

recipes.title: Slow-Cooker Pork Chops
recipes.description: It only takes a few simple ingredients to make these juicy and tender slow-cooker pork chops.

recipes.title: Socca
recipes.description: Socca is a traditional flatbread from Nice, France. It's a common street food, cooked on a grill and served in a paper cone, usually chopped and sprinkled with salt, pepper or other delicious toppings. Bonus: It's gluten free. — Taste of Home Test Kitchen, Milwaukee, Wisconsin

recipes.title: Sour Cream-Leek Biscuits
recipes.description: These biscuits are a wonderful pairing for soups. I've made them with all-purpose white flour as well as whole wheat, and both work equally well.

recipes.title: Spicy Beef Stir Fry
recipes.description: Spice up your dinner rotation with our 30-minute beef stir fry recipe. Tender sirloin and crisp veggies meet a fiery coconut-lime sauce for a quick and delicious meal any night of the week.

recipes.title: Andouille Sausage and Peppers
recipes.description: This tasty sheet pan meal is just what you need when the nights are busy and you have too much to do.<!-- notionvc: 39e9038e-e422-4a4e-b378-09e9a0c693c3 -->

recipes.title: Turkey Meatballs
recipes.description: We make our turkey meatballs with spinach to ensure they turn out tender, juicy and moist. They freeze beautifully, so don’t be afraid to make a double (or triple) batch.

recipes.title: Steak San Marino
recipes.description: I'm a busy pastor's wife and mother of three,  and this delicious, inexpensive and easy main dish helps my day run smoother! The steak is so tender and flavorful, my kids gobble it up and my husband asks for seconds.

recipes.title: Sun-Dried Tomato Focaccia
recipes.description: This bread looks inviting and doesn’t disappoint when you take a bite. The sun-dried tomatoes and red onions give it an extra-special appearance, making it fit for any celebratory meal.

recipes.title: Pork Roast
recipes.description: A simple herb rub and a brown sugar crust create a tender, flavorful pork roast. Serve with pan juices and your favorite sides for a family meal everyone loves.

recipes.title: Sweet & Tangy Salmon with Green Beans
recipes.description: I'm always up for new ways to cook salmon. In this dish, a sweet sauce gives the fish and green beans some down-home barbecue tang. Even our kids love it.

recipes.title: Lamb Stew
recipes.description: Tender chunks of lamb come together with carrots and potatoes in this rich, hearty lamb stew recipe. Serve it as a one-pot meal with crusty bread, or double down on comfort by ladling the stew over polenta or mashed potatoes.

recipes.title: Cabbage Stew
recipes.description: Chock-full of ground turkey, cabbage, carrots and tomatoes, this turkey cabbage soup delivers delicious down-home comfort on cool days.

recipes.title: Ground Turkey Stuffed Peppers
recipes.description: These ground turkey stuffed peppers are a nice change of pace from traditional ground beef and rice peppers. Lean ground turkey gives the peppers a light feel without sacrificing flavor.

recipes.title: Chicken Tzatziki
recipes.description: Chicken tzatziki is the perfect weeknight dinner, a great staple that's easy to prepare but full of flavor. The creamy cucumber sauce goes with just about anything!

recipes.title: Vegetable & Beef Stuffed Red Peppers
recipes.description: I love making this stuffed pepper recipe. It's one of the few ways I can get my husband to eat veggies. Make it meatless by replacing the beef with eggplant and adding more vegetables like mushrooms or squash. You can also replace the rice with barley, couscous or even orzo.

recipes.title: West African Peanut Stew
recipes.description: Even if you don't have the most adventurous palate, West African peanut stew is a dish almost anyone can appreciate. It's a rich, comforting meal for cooler weather, and the ingredients are both familiar and widely available.

recipes.title: Zucchini Ricotta Bake
recipes.description: Layered like lasagna, packed with veggies and dripping in ricotta, this zucchini ricotta bake is comfort food with a green thumb.

recipes.title: Air-Fryer Chicken Breasts
recipes.description: These air-fryer chicken breasts are perfectly cooked with a simple seasoning blend of pantry herbs and spices. File this recipe away for quick dinners and easy meal prep.

recipes.title: Alabama Chicken Stew
recipes.description: North Alabama chicken stew is a regional labor of love full of flavor that comes across in every bite. Make a giant batch to share at large gatherings like potlucks, fundraisers and family get-togethers.

recipes.title: Alex Bala’s One-Pot Short Rib Stroganoff
recipes.description: If you’ve ever made pot roast, you can make short ribs because beef is beef! The rich short ribs simmer low and slow until they're fall-apart tender. Toss in buttery noodles, savory mushrooms and a splash of cream to create a velvety stroganoff sauce, and you’ve got the ultimate comfort meal, all in one pot.

recipes.title: Alfredo Meatballs
recipes.description: These Alfredo meatballs are baked in the oven, then smothered in a velvety homemade sauce. Serve them over hot pasta for a comforting family-friendly dinner.

recipes.title: Pork Chops and Applesauce
recipes.description: If you love the lean, tender texture of pork chops but wish they had more flavor to offer, this recipe for pork chops and applesauce solves the conundrum. You can pretty much let the oven do the work too.

recipes.title: Asian Lettuce Wraps
recipes.description: This recipe is as tasty as the lettuce wraps found in national restaurants, but it's healthier!

recipes.title: Bacon Cheeseburger Pizza
recipes.description: For the nights you crave a burger and a slice at the same time, bacon cheeseburger pizza is your ticket to happiness.

recipes.title: Bacon Cheeseburger Tater Tot Bake
recipes.description: Huge on flavor and not too big in terms of hand-on effort, this bacon cheeseburger tater tot casserole is a meal the chef and the diners alike will always agree on.

recipes.title: Chicken Bacon Swiss Sandwich
recipes.description: This chicken bacon Swiss sandwich recipe combines juicy, boldly flavored chicken breast with smoky, crumbled bacon and a delicious honey mustard sauce to create the perfect bite.

recipes.title: Baked Chicken Legs
recipes.description: These baked chicken legs are crispy on the outside, juicy inside and packed with flavor thanks to a simple blend of pantry spices.

recipes.title: Barbecue Chicken Quesadilla
recipes.description: You and your family will love these barbecue chicken quesadillas, a perfectly quick and easy weeknight dinner that's so tasty you'd pay for it at a restaurant.

recipes.title: Pulled Pork Pasta
recipes.description: When you don't have hours to whip up a slow-cooked meal, this hearty pulled pork pasta recipe is a great shortcut. It tastes as if it cooked all day but can be ready in just 25 minutes.

recipes.title: Mini Barbecue Meat Loaves
recipes.description: Cheesy, tangy, and super juicy, these mini loaves are a total treat.

recipes.title: Bean & Bacon Griddle Burritos
recipes.description: These griddle burritos with bacon and veggies make an awesome hand-held meal. I use fresh pico de gallo when I can, but a jar of salsa works if that’s what you’ve got.

recipes.title: Beanie Weenies
recipes.description: This old-fashioned meal is a New England classic. Beanie weenies are sweet and savory, and best served with a side of molasses-flavored brown bread.

recipes.title: Beef Manhattan
recipes.description: If you've never heard of beef Manhattan, you're about to meet the open-faced sandwich of your dreams. This slow-cooker recipe layers mashed potatoes and juicy roast beef over Texas toast.

recipes.title: Potato Soup
recipes.description: This easy homemade potato soup recipe is a staple side for steak dinners at home or an amazing comfort meal on a chilly day.

recipes.title: Best Lasagna
recipes.description: What makes this classic lasagna recipe so spectacular? Homemade meat sauce and plenty of cheese. Best of all, it's easy to make lasagna ahead of time so dinner can be ready in a flash.

recipes.title: Bison Meat Loaf
recipes.description: Bison meat loaf made with lean bison, herbs and a dash of Big Sky Country isn't just better for you

recipes.title: Blackened Catfish with Mango Avocado Salsa
recipes.description: A delightful and tasty rub makes this quick recipe fantastic. While the fish is sitting to allow the flavors to blend, you can easily assemble the salsa. My family loves this!

recipes.title: Blackened Fish Tacos
recipes.description: Blackened fish tacos take taco night to new heights with spiced pan-fried cod, a cooling cilantro crema and soft tortillas.

recipes.title: BLT Pizza
recipes.description: This recipe takes everything you love about BLT sandwiches and turns it into pizza. We promise, BLT pizza will become a favorite pick for lunch, dinner or an anytime snack.

recipes.title: BLTs
recipes.description: It sneaks up every year, but when the farmers market glows with bright red tomatoes or sunny orange and yellow heirloom varieties, there’s no denying that it’s finally BLT season.

recipes.title: Bow Ties with Gorgonzola Sauce
recipes.description: The name may sound fancy, but this pasta dish is comforting and simple to prepare. Add a mixed green salad to make it a complete meal for any occasion.

recipes.title: Brazilian Chicken Stroganoff
recipes.description: Brazilian chicken stroganoff is a fun twist on a classic that's beloved by Matthew McConaughey and Camila Alves, his Brazilian wife. It's a more heavily seasoned take on Russian stroganoff.

recipes.title: Broccoli Cheddar Pasta
recipes.description: Pull out just one pot to make the creamiest, most flavorful broccoli cheddar pasta ever!

recipes.title: Brown Sugar-Glazed Salmon
recipes.description: A fantastic quick and easy weeknight meal that won’t seem as though it was quick and easy, this brown sugar-glazed salmon will always be welcome on the table.

recipes.title: Burgers with Spicy Dill Salsa
recipes.description: When I make burgers or hot dogs for boating or barbecues, I do a take-along topping that tastes like relish meets salsa. Pile it on anything!

recipes.title: Busy-Day Pork Chops
recipes.description: It was time to use or lose some pork chops I had in the fridge, so I dressed them in bread crumbs and Parmesan and baked them up. Necessity sure is the mother of invention, and in this case I invented an amazing healthy pork chop recipe.

recipes.title: Butternut Squash Ravioli
recipes.description: Take homemade pasta to the next level with this butternut squash ravioli in a cheesy garlic-sage cream sauce.

recipes.title: Cabbage and Broccoli Stir Fry
recipes.description: This stir-fry's sweet and salty sauce is made predominately with miso, maple and butter. While you can use other veggies for this recipe, cabbage and broccoli are fresh and crisp, taking well to the sauce’s umami flavor. Serve the veggies over rice or rice noodles.

recipes.title: Caramelized Pork Tenderloin
recipes.description: This is the best pork tenderloin recipe! It is a little bit savory and a little bit sweet, and best of all, tastes grilled even though you made it on the stovetop.

recipes.title: Cast-Iron Steak
recipes.description: You can enjoy a perfectly seared cast-iron steak any night of week at home. Read on to learn how to cook steak in a skillet in just about 10 minutes.

recipes.title: Catfish and Hush Puppies
recipes.description: Catfish and hush puppies are often served together in Mississippi, but you don't have to live in the South to enjoy these delicious fried dishes!

recipes.title: Cauliflower Tacos
recipes.description: Cauliflower tacos are the perfect vegetarian spin for your Meatless Monday or Taco Tuesday. Spiced cauliflower is roasted till crispy, then piled on soft tortillas with shredded cabbage and a creamy avocado sauce.

recipes.title: Cheeseburger Casserole
recipes.description: Cheeseburger casserole is a one-pot recipe that combines elbow macaroni with all the flavors of a classic cheeseburger, including beef, onion, tomatoes, pickle relish and lots of melty cheese.

recipes.title: Chicken and Dumplings
recipes.description: Perfect for fall nights, my simple version of comforting chicken and dumplings is speedy, low in fat and a delicious one-dish meal.

recipes.title: Chicken and Shaved Brussels Sprouts Salad
recipes.description: We love one-dish meals in my house, and it's even better when I can meal prep and eat it over several days. This salad is packed with healthy, good-for-you vegetables and plenty of protein, featuring rotisserie chicken, spiced pecans and shaved parmesan.

recipes.title: Chicken Biryani
recipes.description: Few South Asian dishes are as exquisite as chicken biryani, with its fragrant spices and perfectly cooked rice.

recipes.title: Chicken & Cheese Tortilla Pie
recipes.description: Trust me when I say this hearty dish can be assembled in minutes, then devoured even quicker with no leftovers.

recipes.title: Chicken Cordon Bleu Pizza
recipes.description: Satisfy multiple food cravings in one delicious meal with this chicken cordon bleu pizza. The crisp crust is loaded with chicken, ham and Swiss.

recipes.title: Chicken Fajita Casserole
recipes.description: Chicken fajita casserole is a creamy and cheesy one-dish recipe perfect for busy weeknights. It's a flavorful and fast meal made with precooked chicken, instant rice and a packet of fajita seasoning mix.

recipes.title: Chicken-Fried Elk Steak
recipes.description: Chicken-fried elk steak is buttermilk-marinated, double-dredged and fried to perfection. Now that's how Wyoming makes comfort food.

recipes.title: Chicken Lollipop
recipes.description: Love a chicken drumstick? Then you'll really get a kick out of a chicken lollipop with a sweet and sticky homemade sauce.

recipes.title: Chicken Picante
recipes.description: Chicken picante gives simple chicken breasts a flavor upgrade with a three-ingredient spicy sauce made from jarred picante sauce, brown sugar and mustard.

recipes.title: Chicken Potpie Muffins
recipes.description: These chicken potpie muffins are the grab-and-go version of the classic comfort food dish, with the welcome addition of cornbread.

recipes.title: Chicken Potpie Pasta
recipes.description: Craving chicken potpie, but not the part where you actually have to make one? Chicken potpie pasta brings all the flavor with none of the pie-making.

recipes.title: Chicken Tinga Tacos
recipes.description: Chicken tinga tacos are packed with saucy, spicy chicken. Top them with your favorite fresh herbs, Mexican cheeses and more.

recipes.title: Chicken Tortellini Alfredo
recipes.description: This chicken tortellini Alfredo combines two types of Italian cheese and a hint of nutmeg for a sauce that tastes as if it came from your favorite trattoria.

recipes.title: Chicken Vesuvio
recipes.description: Chicken vesuvio is a visually stunning dish that's just begging to be the centerpiece at your next dinner party or special occasion meal.

recipes.title: Chickpea Tacos
recipes.description: Add some zippy spice, load up the toppings and these chickpea tacos become a perfect protein-packed vegetarian option for taco night, or any night.

recipes.title: Chiles Rellenos
recipes.description: An emblematic dish in Mexico, chiles rellenos are cheese-stuffed poblano peppers that have been battered and fried.

recipes.title: Chili Crisp Salmon with Avocado and Cucumber Salad
recipes.description: California roll but make it light? Chili crisp salmon with avocado and cucumber salad is about to be your new lunchtime favorite.

recipes.title: Chipotle Chili Sloppy Joes
recipes.description: My husband didn't like sloppy joes until he tried my rendition with its smoky heat. If you need to dial down the fiery zip, cut down on or eliminate the peppers.

recipes.title: Chopped Cheese
recipes.description: Bring a taste of New York City to your kitchen with this chopped cheese recipe that packs crispy ground beef and melty cheese into a soft roll with all the toppings.

recipes.title: Coconut Curry Chicken
recipes.description: The next time you're craving coconut curry chicken, step away from the takeout menu and make it in your own kitchen.

recipes.title: Chicken Broccoli Casserole
recipes.description: When you're looking for comfort and ease, this chicken broccoli casserole is the answer to your dinner dreams.

recipes.title: Copycat Taco Bell Grilled Cheese Burrito
recipes.description: This copycat Taco Bell grilled cheese burrito tastes just like the original. No need to leave the house next time you have a craving!

recipes.title: Copycat Uno Rattlesnake Pasta
recipes.description: Fans of Uno Pizzeria and Grill rejoice! This copycat Uno rattlesnake pasta recipe perfectly replicates the cheesy, creamy and spicy jalapeno flavor of the restaurant's dish.

recipes.title: Crescent Turkey Casserole
recipes.description: How do you make a dinner of turkey and vegetables appealing to kids? You turn it into a pie, of course! My version tastes classic but doesn’t take any time at all.

recipes.title: Crispy BBQ Chip Tenders
recipes.description: These crunchy chicken tenders are a little sweet, a little tangy and a whole lot of fun. In half an hour, your family's new favorite dish is ready to eat. When I have extra time, I roast garlic and add it to the sauce.

recipes.title: Easy Orange Chicken
recipes.description: You'll say goodbye to takeout and hello to homemade once you try this easy orange chicken recipe.

recipes.title: Crispy Rice Salad
recipes.description: Baking leftover rice on a sheet pan gives it a crispy texture and golden color. Then, topping it with a tahini-soy dressing and plenty of veggies makes this crispy rice salad a dinner-in-a-bowl that is exciting, full of texture and endlessly customizable.

recipes.title: Croque-Monsieur
recipes.description: Made with ham, cheese, sharp mustard and soft, sweet bread, the classic French croque-monsieur sandwich elevates brunches and lunches.

recipes.title: Detroit Greek Salad
recipes.description: A Detroit Greek salad includes all your favorite Greek salad components, plus a few unexpected ingredients that pack in even more flavor.

recipes.title: Taco Skillet
recipes.description: Beefy, cheesy, saucy and oh, so delicious, this easy taco skillet recipe comes together in under 30 minutes and is made with everyday pantry and kitchen staples.

recipes.title: Easy Chana Masala
recipes.description: I love this quick and healthy Indian-inspired dish so much I always make sure to have the ingredients stocked in my pantry. It makes weeknight dinners feel a little more special.

recipes.title: Easy Stuffed Shells
recipes.description: I threw this recipe together one day when we had unexpected guests. It was an immediate hit and is now a family favorite. Get the kids involved when putting together this simple, savory dish.

recipes.title: Elise Jesse’s Maple Dijon Salmon
recipes.description: Looking for a quick, healthy, flavorful dinner with minimal cleanup? This maple Dijon salmon (or "pink steak" as my kids call it) with green beans is your perfect one-pan solution. Tender salmon fillets are topped with a sweet and tangy maple-Dijon glaze and baked alongside crisp-tender green beans, making for a delicious meal that requires less than 15  minutes of hands-on time. It’s my go-to for busy weeknights when I want something tasty, I don’t want to clean up a big mess, and I want to avoid the dinner plate struggle with the kids.

recipes.title: Enchiladas Rojas
recipes.description: Slathered with a well-seasoned red chile sauce, tortilla-wrapped enchiladas rojas stuffed with chicken make an exceptionally flavorful meal.

recipes.title: Enchiladas Suizas
recipes.description: This creamy, spicy enchiladas suizas recipe translates your favorite restaurant meal into a simple chicken casserole you can make at home any night of the week.

recipes.title: English Muffin Pizza
recipes.description: This English muffin pizza recipe is a fun and easy way to make personal pizzas using store-bought English muffins. With crispy edges, melty cheese and zippy pepperoni slices, these pizzas are perfect as a quick lunch or after-school snack.

recipes.title: Chicken Divan with Mayo
recipes.description: Creamy, cheesy sauce, tender chicken and frozen broccoli cook to bubbling perfection under a cap of crunchy bread crumbs in this chicken Divan with mayo recipe.

recipes.title: Chicken Potpie
recipes.description: Learning how to make chicken potpie from scratch is 100% worth it. This chicken potpie recipe features a flaky, buttery crust packed with chicken, vegetables and a creamy sauce.

recipes.title: Firecracker Casserole
recipes.description: As its name implies, this Tex-Mex flavored firecracker casserole explodes with the spicy, savory flavors of the Southwest.

recipes.title: Flank Steak Tacos
recipes.description: A spicy marinade ensures these flank steak tacos are super flavorful. Served in corn tortillas with simple toppings, they make a perfect fuss-free weeknight meal.

recipes.title: French Onion Gnocchi Soup
recipes.description: This French onion gnocchi soup recipe turns classic French onion soup on its head with the addition of tender, plump potato gnocchi.

recipes.title: French Onion Grilled Cheese
recipes.description: This French onion grilled cheese recipe is the dressed-up, grown-up version of the beloved childhood sandwich.

recipes.title: French Onion Pasta
recipes.description: French onion pasta is an internet favorite that captures all the savory flavor of the classic soup in a hearty noodle dish.

recipes.title: Fried Cheese Curds
recipes.description: Calling all Wisconsin residents (past and present)! These fried cheese curds may just be the best we've ever had.

recipes.title: Fried Fish Sandwich
recipes.description: The airy beer batter of this fried fish sandwich tastes even better with the creamy homemade tartar sauce and crunchy coleslaw.

recipes.title: Frikadellen
recipes.description: Frikadellen, the savory German meat patties, are packed with flavor and will change the way you think about hamburgers.

recipes.title: Frittata Florentine
recipes.description: My family is all about brunchy meals like this gorgeous Italian omelet. Lucky for us, it’s loaded with ingredients we tend to have at the ready.

recipes.title: Shrimp and Mushroom Pasta
recipes.description: Shrimp and mushroom pasta is a 30-minute weeknight flex: quick, balanced and varied, with seafood veggies and pasta.

recipes.title: Gluten-Free Fried Chicken
recipes.description: This gluten-free fried chicken recipe understands the assignment. It's crunchy and crispy on the outside and juicy on the inside.

recipes.title: Gnocchi Carbonara
recipes.description: Gnocchi carbonara is a twist on the classic Italian dish, featuring tender gnocchi tossed in a silky Parmesan and egg sauce with lots of crispy bacon.

recipes.title: Gnocchi Mac and Cheese
recipes.description: Gnocchi mac and cheese might be the most indulgent mac and cheese ever. Instead of regular noodles, the recipe is made with tender potato dumplings and three kinds of Italian cheese.

recipes.title: Gnocchi Piccata
recipes.description: We remixed the Italian-American classic to make gnocchi piccata, a saucy dish made with bright lemon and briny capers.

recipes.title: Gnudi (Ricotta Gnocchi)
recipes.description: Gnudi, or delicate ricotta gnocchi, are surprisingly easy to make. Enjoy them with a simple tomato or butter sauce and a sprinkling of Parmesan cheese.

recipes.title: Greek Chicken Pasta
recipes.description: This hearty main dish has great Mediterranean flavor. I left out the olives, and my family still loved it.

recipes.title: Greek Meatballs
recipes.description: These juicy baked Greek meatballs are a Mediterranean twist on a weeknight favorite. Seasoned with fresh mint, dill and tangy feta and served with creamy homemade tzatziki, they’re perfect as a satisfying appetizer or the main event.

recipes.title: Greek Pork Chops
recipes.description: Bright, tangy Greek pork chops are finished on the grill or under the broiler in 10 minutes after an overnight marinade.

recipes.title: Grilled Basil Chicken and Tomatoes
recipes.description: Relax after work with a cold drink while this savory chicken marinates in an herby tomato blend for an hour, then toss it on the grill. It tastes just like summer.

recipes.title: Grilled Beef & Blue Cheese Sandwiches
recipes.description: Roast beef, red onion and blue cheese really amp up this deluxe grilled sandwich. If you like a little heat, mix some horseradish into the spread.

recipes.title: Grilled Halibut Packages
recipes.description: Nothing could be easier than this elegant, delicious and healthy dinner. I love serving it to guests because I make the packets ahead of time along with a salad.

recipes.title: Huli Huli Chicken
recipes.description: This huli huli chicken recipe will bring island flavor to your backyard. These grilled chicken thighs are marinated and finished with a sweet and savory sauce.

recipes.title: Grilled Ribeye with Garlic Blue Cheese Mustard Sauce
recipes.description: This simple steak gets a big flavor boost from two of my favorites: mustard and blue cheese. My husband and I make this recipe to celebrate our anniversary each year!

recipes.title: Ground Turkey Pasta
recipes.description: This ground turkey pasta recipe makes a big batch of thick, savory sauce. You'll be lucky if there are any leftovers.

recipes.title: Ground Turkey Tacos
recipes.description: Ground turkey tacos are a lighter twist on classic tacos. Ground turkey contains less fat than ground beef but still delivers plenty of protein and flavor.

recipes.title: Haddock with Lime-Cilantro Butter
recipes.description: Here in Louisiana, the good times roll when we broil fish and serve it with lots of lime juice, cilantro and butter.

recipes.title: Ham & Egg Wraps
recipes.description: This is a great kid-friendly recipe that takes only 20 minutes to prepare and cook.

recipes.title: Ham & Veggie Casserole
recipes.description: I’ve paired ham with broccoli and cauliflower for years. To complete this casserole dinner, I pass around some dinner rolls.

recipes.title: Hearty Pork Chops
recipes.description: Just six ingredients are required for the tasty mix that marinates these well-seasoned chops. Whip up the combination to marinate overnight, and you'll have dinner on the table in no time tomorrow.

recipes.title: Homemade Chicken Potpie
recipes.description: Why look for potpie in the frozen food aisle when this easy version tastes much better? The chicken pot pie's crust is so tender and flaky, and underneath you'll find the ultimate comfort food for kids and adults.

recipes.title: Homemade Hamburger Helper
recipes.description: This one-pot homemade Hamburger Helper tastes just like the store-bought version, but without the additives and preservatives. It's a tried-and-true family favorite that's rich, creamy and totally comforting.

recipes.title: Homemade Pumpkin Pasta
recipes.description: This 30-minute pasta is a scary-good Halloween dinner. Pumpkin and carrots give the sauce a bright orange color.

recipes.title: Hot Dog Pie
recipes.description: A co-worker who loves hot dogs shared this recipe with me. Baked in a purchased pastry shell, the pie is easy to assemble and is on the table in just 30 minutes.

recipes.title: Hot Honey Chicken Tenders
recipes.description: Our recipe for hot honey chicken tenders features chicken tenderloins that are fried until golden and crispy, then generously drizzled with a sweet and spicy hot honey.

recipes.title: Indian-Style Butter Gnocchi
recipes.description: This butter gnocchi mixes Indian and Italian cuisines, bathing tender gnocchi in a creamy and richly spiced tomato sauce.

recipes.title: White Bean and Sausage Soup
recipes.description: White bean and sausage soup blends Mediterranean flavors, creamy beans, veggies and fresh herbs for an Italian-style bowl that's nutritious, filling and comforting.

recipes.title: Lemony Tortellini Bacon Salad
recipes.description: Who says summer meals have to be complicated? We love this tangy, simple and tasty salad on warm summer nights. Add a cold glass of lemonade or iced tea and dinner couldn’t be easier.

recipes.title: Mahi Mahi & Veggie Skillet
recipes.description: Cooking mahi mahi with a mix of vegetables may seem complex, but I developed this skillet recipe to bring out the wow factor without the hassle and fuss.

recipes.title: Maqluba
recipes.description: Maqluba is a traditional Middle Eastern dish with layers of vegetables, warmly spiced meat and rice. When flipped upside down, the layers are revealed.

recipes.title: Marry Me Pot Roast
recipes.description: Want to win their heart? First, win their taste buds with a flavorful and tender Marry Me pot roast!

recipes.title: Meatball Submarine Casserole
recipes.description: We were hosting a bunch of friends, and after a comedy of errors, I had to come up with a plan B for dinner. I realized that much-loved meatball subs are even better as a hearty casserole

recipes.title: Mediterranean Omelet
recipes.description: This fluffy omelet gives us reason to get a move on for breakfast. For a bit of extra flair, add some chopped fresh herbs like basil, oregano or tarragon.

recipes.title: Pork and Orzo
recipes.description: Take a trip to a waterfront locale with protein-rich, health-minded Mediterranean pork and orzo. Tomatoes, spinach and feta add bright punches of color to the meat and pasta.

recipes.title: Million Dollar Soup
recipes.description: This soup stands apart with its decadent, restaurant-level flavor. Million dollar soup has a rich broth and several flavorful ingredients like bacon and caramelized onions.

recipes.title: Moo Shu Mushroom Wraps
recipes.description: With so many awesome veggies out there, I'm always playing around with the ingredients in these sandwiches. Sometimes I add extra protein, too

recipes.title: Lasagna Cups
recipes.description: These lasagna cups are the easiest way to turn cheese and red sauce into dinner. They're mini, crispy, cheesy and fun.

recipes.title: North Carolina Shrimp Saute
recipes.description: Seafood is very popular in my state. I altered this recipe several times and now it's truly a family favorite.

recipes.title: Oyster Stew
recipes.description: Oyster stew incorporates all that briny bivalve flavor into a rich, creamy, soulful soup. Serve it on special occasions or anytime, and don't forget the crusty bread.

recipes.title: Pastitsio Soup
recipes.description: This creamy, meaty and pasta-filled pastitsio soup recipe recreates the savory, warmly spiced flavor of Greek lasagna.

recipes.title: Philly Cheesesteak
recipes.description: If you can’t make it to Philadelphia any time soon, this Philly cheesesteak recipe will satisfy your craving for the city's signature sandwich. Our version comes from the family of the man who invented cheesesteaks, so it's safe to say you’re in pretty good hands.

recipes.title: Philadelphia Tomato Pie
recipes.description: Bake a famous Philadelphia tomato pie for your next party as a casual finger food. Everyone will love it just as much as Philadelphians do.

recipes.title: Philly Cheesesteak Soup
recipes.description: This Philly cheesesteak soup tastes just like the classic sandwich, thanks to thin slices of steak, peppers, mushrooms and melted cheese in every spoonful. The hoagie crouton garnish makes the correlation between the two foods undeniable!

recipes.title: Pickle-Brine Turkey
recipes.description: If brining a turkey in salt water creates a tender, juicy bird, wouldn't a pickle-brine turkey be even better? The answer is yes!

recipes.title: Pickle-Brined Chicken
recipes.description: Use up that leftover juice from the jar and make pickle-brined chicken. It's tender, juicy and lightly flavored with the sweet, salty and sour taste of pickles.

recipes.title: Pizza Fiesta
recipes.description: I combined my two favorite foods, sweet corn and pizza, in this easy and cheesy recipe. My family can't get enough of it! You can grill the corn first for even more flavor.

recipes.title: Pollo Guisado
recipes.description: Pollo guisado is a warming, homey chicken stew popular across Latin America. This Puerto Rican version is made with olives, tomatoes, potatoes, sofrito and spices.

recipes.title: Poor Man’s Casserole
recipes.description: Don't let the name fool you

recipes.title: Popcorn Shrimp Tacos
recipes.description: With crispy shrimp, tangy coleslaw and warm corn tortillas, these popcorn shrimp tacos are a delightful way to mix it up for taco night.

recipes.title: Honey-Garlic Pork Chops
recipes.description: Tender pork loin chops and a sweet but salty Chinese-inspired glaze go together beautifully in these honey-garlic pork chops. The recipe is low on fat, sodium, prep time and skills required, making it a solid weeknight option.

recipes.title: Pork Medallions in Mustard Sauce
recipes.description: I like pork medallions with apricot preserves and wondered how else I could dress them up. I played around with different flavors until I found this combo. Wows every time.

recipes.title: Pork and Potatoes
recipes.description: Hearty pork and potatoes is the definition of comfort food. This recipe will lead you to a dish that's wholesome, nourishing and easy to get on the table for dinner.

recipes.title: Pork Ramen Noodles
recipes.description: Turn basic instant ramen noodles into a full meal with this easy pork ramen noodles recipe. A very filling and yummy meal that's great for any night of the week.

recipes.title: Sausage, Peppers and Potatoes
recipes.description: This easy one-pan sausage, peppers and potatoes bake is a rustic, cozy meal that makes any weeknight feel special.

recipes.title: Potato Kielbasa Skillet
recipes.description: This one-pan potato kielbasa skillet combines tender potatoes, smoky kielbasa and fresh spinach in a brown sugar sauce into a satisfying weeknight dinner. Serve it with a sauerkraut side to keep on theme.

recipes.title: Pumpkin Quesadillas
recipes.description: It takes only 15 minutes to put together flavorful, savory pumpkin quesadillas. The filling features pumpkin puree with black beans and plenty of cheese, making the quesadillas a family favorite every fall.

recipes.title: Roasted Kohlrabi & Carrot Ribbon Salad
recipes.description: This vibrant salad combines tender roasted kohlrabi and sweet carrot ribbons tossed with a tangy lemon-honey vinaigrette. Toasted pepitas add a satisfying crunch, while fresh herbs brighten every bite. Naturally low in calories and fat, this dish is packed with nutrients, gluten-free and perfect as a light lunch or side.

recipes.title: Rotisserie Chicken Soup
recipes.description: In the mood for a warm bowl? Rotisserie chicken soup is a quick and easy weeknight meal that combines veggies, chicken and plump egg noodles in a savory broth.

recipes.title: Runzas
recipes.description: If you've never heard of this Nebraska specialty, you're in for a treat! Runzas are soft and fluffy yeast rolls that are stuffed with savory beef, onion and cabbage.

recipes.title: Sheet-Pan Chicken Fajitas
recipes.description: Don't let the lack of sizzling theatrics fool you

recipes.title: Sheet-Pan Chicken Potpie
recipes.description: Sheet-pan chicken potpie is for the crust lovers. This variation spreads the filling over a wider surface, enabling a higher crust-to-filling ratio.

recipes.title: Shrimp Spaghetti
recipes.description: Shrimp spaghetti turns ordinary pasta into a light and colorful one-dish meal with peppers, onions and garlic.

recipes.title: Shrimp Tacos
recipes.description: With a hot skillet, some corn tortillas and your favorite taco toppings, spicy shrimp tacos will be on the table in minutes.

recipes.title: Skillet Mac and Cheese
recipes.description: This skillet mac and cheese takes a few more minutes than the boxed stuff, but we promise the final result is worth it. A thick and creamy cheese sauce is stirred together with perfectly cooked pasta, then topped with whatever you like.

recipes.title: Seared Scallops
recipes.description: This scallops recipe has everything you need to give these tender mollusks a golden sear. Serve them solo or with a tangle of buttery pasta for a delightful and effortless dinner.

recipes.title: The Best Shepherd’s Pie
recipes.description: Our top-rated shepherd's pie recipe delivers a cozy, filling, homestyle dinner that never disappoints.

recipes.title: Skinny Cobb Salad
recipes.description: This skinny version of Cobb salad has all the taste and creaminess with half the fat and calories. You can skip the coleslaw mix and use all lettuce, but I like the crunch you get with cabbage.

recipes.title: Sloppy Joe Biscuit Cups
recipes.description: I’m a busy teacher and mom, so weekday meals with shortcuts are a huge help. I always have to share the recipe when I take these to school.

recipes.title: Slow-Cooker Boursin Chicken Pasta
recipes.description: This easy slow-cooker Boursin chicken pasta is comfort in a bowl. The rich and creamy cheese sauce bursts with the flavors of garlic, sun-dried tomatoes and fine Italian herbs.

recipes.title: Slow-Cooker Chicken Stew
recipes.description: If you love home-cooked meals but hate standing over a stove, this hearty slow-cooker chicken stew will change your life. Set it, forget it, and return to a pot of cozy comfort.

recipes.title: Slow-Cooker Honey Garlic Chicken
recipes.description: This easy recipe for slow-cooker honey garlic chicken features boneless, skinless chicken thighs simmered to tender perfection in a sticky, sweet and tangy honey garlic sauce.

recipes.title: Slow-Cooker Marry Me Chicken
recipes.description: Spend less time at the stove and more time with your honey by making flavorful slow-cooker marry me chicken.

recipes.title: Smash Burger Tacos
recipes.description: Smash burger tacos combine the best of two favorite foods into one viral recipe. Featuring crispy-edged beef patties, a creamy pickle-spiked sauce and toasted flour tortillas, they're the tacos of our dreams.

recipes.title: Smothered Chicken Breasts
recipes.description: After trying a similar chicken dish in a restaurant, I decided to re-create it at home. Topped with bacon, caramelized onions and shredded cheese, this savory dish comes together in no time, and uses ingredients that I usually have on hand. And since it cooks in one skillet, it’s a cinch to clean up!

recipes.title: Southwest Chicken Barley Chowder
recipes.description: Mashed squash helps make this chowder creamy but not heavy, and it's a favorite way to get barley on the table. My kids even ask for leftovers for lunch.

recipes.title: Soy Sauce Chicken
recipes.description: Soy sauce chicken is a speedy dinner made by simmering boneless skinless chicken thighs in soy sauce, wine, aromatics and spices.

recipes.title: Spaghetti all’Assassina (Assassin’s Spaghetti)
recipes.description: When you bite into this spaghetti, it bites back! Spaghetti all'assassina is spicy and slow-simmered in a thick chili and garlic tomato sauce.

recipes.title: Spaghetti Squash Pizzas
recipes.description: These easy spaghetti squash pizzas are a fantastic way to lighten up pizza night at your house.

recipes.title: Spicy Tomato Pork Chops
recipes.description: Simmered in tomato sauce, these pork chops are big at our house. I add garlic powder and Creole or Cajun seasoning before browning the chops to give them extra punch.

recipes.title: Chicken with Spinach and Mushrooms
recipes.description: Savor tender bites of chicken with spinach and mushrooms, a quick and easy dish that's healthy, tasty and perfect for busy weeknight dinners. Enjoy it over rice or pasta for a complete meal.

recipes.title: Spinach Artichoke Dip Soup
recipes.description: This spinach artichoke dip soup transforms creamy and cheesy spinach artichoke dip into a rich, veggie-packed, bright and brothy soup.

recipes.title: Beef Pot Pie
recipes.description: Save this beef pot pie recipe for chilly nights. The generously meaty filling will warm you right up.

recipes.title: Stuffed Ham
recipes.description: With its green vegetable-swirled filling, stuffed ham is a local favorite in St. Mary’s County, Maryland.

recipes.title: How to Cook a Ham
recipes.description: Whip up a gorgeous holiday centerpiece with this easy glazed ham recipe. Our Test Kitchen experts share their best tips and tricks for how to cook a ham for special occasions.

recipes.title: Sunshine Poached Salmon
recipes.description: You'll most likely already have all the ingredients in your cupboard to make this quick salmon recipe. My husband is a picky eater, but even he loves the sweet and slight heat flavors that come through.

recipes.title: Easy Chicken Fried Rice
recipes.description: After my first child was born, I needed meals that were satisfying and fast. This easy chicken fried rice is now part of our regular dinner rotation.

recipes.title: Sushi Bake
recipes.description: Forget about buying a fancy maki kit. You can enjoy the great taste of sushi at home with this easy sushi bake recipe.

recipes.title: Sweet Potato Chowder
recipes.description: Thanks to sweet potatoes, pancetta, cream and kale, this sweet potato chowder is so comforting and flavorful!

recipes.title: Tacos al Pastor
recipes.description: Our tacos al pastor recipe features juicy pork marinated in a sweet, smoky, chili-spiced adobo sauce, then grilled to perfection.

recipes.title: Tam To’s Korean Spicy Braised Chicken
recipes.description: This Korean spicy braised chicken is a healthier, flavor-packed alternative to fried chicken. It’s tender, juicy and simmered in a rich gochujang-based sauce that’s comforting and gives a bit of a kick! Made in just one pot, this protein-rich meal comes together in under 40 minutes.

recipes.title: Tangy Grilled Pineapple Chicken
recipes.description: This juicy grilled pineapple chicken recipe brings summery, tropical flavor to the table.

recipes.title: Burritos
recipes.description: Packed with beans, your choice of protein and a myriad of other potential fillings, this easy burrito recipe is your launchpad to unlimited flavor combinations.

recipes.title: Steak Diane
recipes.description: Sometimes, I add more mushrooms to this recipe when my son's eating dinner

recipes.title: Tofu and Veggie Buddha Bowl With Miso Dressing
recipes.description: This is a healthy, colorful, one-bowl meal for those looking to mix things up in the kitchen. It's loaded with cabbage, mushrooms, radishes and carrots. Serve either warm or at room temperature.

recipes.title: Tofu Tacos
recipes.description: Tofu tacos get a bold upgrade with a chili-spiced marinade and a high-heat roast that delivers crisp, golden edges.

recipes.title: Tomato & Garlic Butter Bean Dinner
recipes.description: On the days I get home late and just want a warm meal, I stir together tomatoes, garlic and butter beans. Ladle it over noodles if you're in the mood for pasta.

recipes.title: Tomato-Poached Halibut
recipes.description: My halibut with a burst of lemon comes together in one pan and stays super moist. Try it with polenta, angel hair pasta or crusty bread.

recipes.title: Tropical Veggie Quinoa Bowl with Citrus-Basil Dressing
recipes.description: A trip to the farmers market inspired this veggie quinoa bowl. The sweetness of the mango complements the tangy citrus dressing, while the creamy avocado adds a rich texture.

recipes.title: Turkey Gyros
recipes.description: Greek seasoning, feta cheese and dill-cucumber sauce give this gyro an authentic taste. It was my family's introduction to how really good pita bread can be. Instead of feta cheese, we'll sprinkle on cheddar or Monterey Jack if we have it.

recipes.title: Turkey Taco Salad
recipes.description: I discovered this taco salad while I was on a health kick. My husband and I love it now. When I served it at a family birthday party, everyone eagerly asked for the recipe.

recipes.title: Turkish Pasta
recipes.description: This Turkish pasta is TikTok famous for a reason. The dish is a tasty combination of pasta, seasoned ground beef and tangy yogurt, all drizzled with a flavorful paprika butter sauce.

recipes.title: Tyler Smith’s Ritz Chicken & Potatoes
recipes.description: There is nothing that gives you the feels of being at home more than a nostalgic meal you grew up with. This Ritz chicken and mashed potatoes recipe is just the thing! It's a simple baked chicken dish packed with lots of savory flavor.

recipes.title: Vegan Red Beans and Rice
recipes.description: You'll never miss the meat with this vegan red beans and rice recipe. Filled with aromatics, spices and vegetable broth, it's a perfect centerpiece to a southern meal.

recipes.title: Vegan Scalloped Potatoes
recipes.description: Our vegan scalloped potatoes are cheesy, creamy and luxuriously decadent

recipes.title: Vegan Stroganoff
recipes.description: This vegan Stroganoff is a cozy, plant-based twist on the classic dish, featuring tender mushrooms in a tangy, creamy sauce. Serve it over hot noodles for a hearty meal.

recipes.title: Veggie-Stuffed Spaghetti Squash
recipes.description: I made this one night when I wanted spaghetti squash, but it was too hot to turn on the oven. Filled with peppers, tomatoes and cheese, this tasty spaghetti squash cooks perfectly in the air fryer.

recipes.title: Adana Kabob
recipes.description: Made with the essential trio of lamb, cumin and dried chile peppers, Adana kabob is succulent and perfectly spiced. Serve the grilled Turkish ground lamb kabobs with a bright sumac onion salad.

recipes.title: Air-Fryer Plantains
recipes.description: These air-fryer plantains are a healthier twist on the classic, delivering all the flavor and texture you love, just with less oil and mess. Best of all, a batch is ready in just 30 minutes.

recipes.title: Alex Bala’s Crispy Potato Shrimp & Grits Minis
recipes.description: Crispy, creamy, cheesy and loaded with flavor, these shrimp and grit bites turn a southern classic into a bite-sized showstopper. Each one starts with a golden potato base and is then topped with a velvety creamy grits sauce filled with savory ham and perfectly seasoned shrimp. These bites are perfect for brunch, holidays or whenever you want an appetizer that disappears instantly.

recipes.title: Apple Crumble Kugel
recipes.description: I received an apple crumble recipe from my sister and combined it with kugel. A crumb topping enhances this brunch-style treat!

recipes.title: Arroz Verde con Pollo
recipes.description: This Peruvian-style recipe is hands-off and surprisingly family-friendly

recipes.title: Banoffee Pie
recipes.description: Need a showstopper dessert that doesn't require baking the day away? This banoffee pie recipe is the answer.

recipes.title: Hummus
recipes.description: Once you learn how to make hummus from scratch, you'll never want to go back to store-bought dip!

recipes.title: Blackberry Margarita
recipes.description: The blackberry margarita is a fun twist on a classic margarita. It gets its citrusy flavor from lime juice and triple sec, and homemade blackberry syrup adds a fruity finish and a gorgeous purple hue.

recipes.title: Braided Round Challah
recipes.description: I made this for a surprise for one of my friends on a Jewish holiday. She could not believe how amazing the bread turned out!

recipes.title: Brazilian Lemonade
recipes.description: After you try this cool and refreshing Brazilian lemonade recipe, it will become your summertime staple for sipping.

recipes.title: Brazilian Pork & Black Bean Stew
recipes.description: During high school, I spent a year in Brazil and fell in love with the culture and food. One of my favorite dishes was feijoada, a chili/stew served over white rice. I introduced this easy recipe to my family, and it has become one of our favorite comfort foods.

recipes.title: Brown Bag Apple Pie
recipes.description: This retro brown bag apple pie features a flaky double crust and a spiced apple filling. Baking it in a paper bag is the secret to a crisp, golden crust and tender, juicy apples every time.

recipes.title: Caipirinha
recipes.description: A proper caipirinha recipe needs three things: lime, sugar cubes and Brazil's national spirit, cachaça. This refreshing cocktail tastes like the perfect day at a Brazilian beach, even if you sip it in your backyard.

recipes.title: Chai Cinnamon Rolls
recipes.description: Lean into cozy fall mornings with a breakfast to match. These chai cinnamon rolls are a latte and a pastry baked into one.

recipes.title: Chaider
recipes.description: Chaider is the versatile fall drink that plays just as well at brunch as it does at happy hour. Spike it or sip it straight!

recipes.title: Chicago Hot Dogs
recipes.description: Whether you're a purist, a historian or just really hungry, our Chicago hot dogs recipe is a home run.

recipes.title: Beef Empanadas
recipes.description: Our Chilean-inspired beef empanada recipe is a great place to start when learning how to make beef empanadas. We’ll show you how to crimp and seal the dough and how to keep your empanadas from falling apart, with plenty of tips for other fillings and flavors.

recipes.title: Chilean Monkey Tail Punch
recipes.description: Stories vary surrounding the origins of this punch's unique name. Some say it was initially served in a bottle depicting a monkey with a long tail, but others suggest it was named after a funny incident with a Chilean president in the early 1900s.
